tika-abh07t:16_0: 3. Tattha cittaṃ tāva catubbidhaṃ hoti kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacaraṃ lokuttarañceti.
tika-abh07t:20_2: upekkhāsahagataṃ uddhaccasampayuttamekanti imāni dvepi momūhacittāni nāma.
tika-abh07t:25_7: upekkhāsahagataṃ santīraṇacittañceti imāni sattapi akusalavipākacittāni nāma.
tika-abh07t:26_8: upekkhāsahagataṃ santīraṇacittañceti imāni aṭṭhapi kusalavipākāhetukacittāni nāma.
tika-abh07t:27_3: somanassasahagataṃ hasituppādacittañceti imāni tīṇipi ahetukakiriyacittāni nāma.
tika-abh07t:44_5: upekkhekaggatāsahitaṃ pañcamajjhānakusalacittañceti imāni pañcapi rūpāvacarakusalacittāni nāma.
tika-abh07t:45_5: upekkhekaggatāsahitaṃ pañcamajjhānavipākacittañceti imāni pañcapi rūpāvacaravipākacittāni nāma.
tika-abh07t:46_5: upekkhekaggatāsahitaṃ pañcamajjhānakiriyacittañceti imāni pañcapi rūpāvacarakiriyacittāni nāma.
tika-abh07t:71_6: upekkhekaggatāsahitaṃ pañcamajjhānasotāpattimaggacittañceti imāni pañcapi sotāpattimaggacittāni nāma.
tika-abh07t:73_0: 40. Tathā phalacittāni ceti samacattālīsa lokuttaracittāni bhavantīti.
tika-abh07t:89_1: Phasso vedanā saññā cetanā ekaggatā jīvitindriyaṃ manasikāro ceti sattime cetasikā sabbacittasādhāraṇā nāma.
tika-abh07t:90_0: 3. Vitakko vicāro adhimokkho vīriyaṃ pīti chando cāti cha ime cetasikā pakiṇṇakā nāma.
tika-abh07t:93_1: Moho ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ uddhaccaṃ lobho diṭṭhi māno doso issā macchariyaṃ kukkuccaṃ thinaṃ middhaṃ vicikicchā ceti cuddasime cetasikā akusalā nāma.
tika-abh07t:95_1: Saddhā sati hirī ottappaṃ alobho adoso tatramajjhattatā kāyapassaddhi cittapassaddhi kāyalahutā cittalahutā
tika-abh07t:95_2: kāyamudutā cittamudutā kāyakammaññatā cittakammaññatā kāyapāguññatā cittapāguññatā kāyujukatā cittujukatā
tika-abh07t:96_0: 7. Sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvo ceti tisso viratiyo nāma.
tika-abh07t:97_1: Karuṇā muditā appamaññāyo nāmāti sabbathāpi paññindriyena saddhiṃ pañcavīsatime cetasikā sobhanāti veditabbā.
tika-abh07t:107_0: 12. Kathaṃ? Sabbacittasādhāraṇā tāva sattime cetasikā sabbesupi ekūnanavuticittuppādesu labbhanti.
tika-abh07t:108_1: Pakiṇṇakesu pana vitakko tāva dvipañcaviññāṇavajjitakāmāvacaracittesu ceva ekādasasu paṭhamajjhānacittesu ceti pañcapaññāsacittesu uppajjati.
tika-abh07t:109_0: 14. Vicāro pana tesu ceva ekādasasu dutiyajjhānacittesu cāti chasaṭṭhicittesu.
tika-abh07t:120_1: Akusalesu pana moho ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ uddhaccañcāti cattārome cetasikā sabbākusalasādhāraṇā nāma,
tika-abh07t:124_0: 24. Doso issā macchariyaṃ kukkuccañcāti dvīsu paṭighasampayuttacittesu.
tika-abh07t:134_1: Sobhanesu pana sobhanasādhāraṇā tāva ekūnavīsatime cetasikā sabbesupi ekūnasaṭṭhisobhanacittesu saṃvijjanti.
tika-abh07t:135_1: Viratiyo pana tissopi lokuttaracittesu sabbathāpi niyatā ekatova labbhanti,
tika-abh07t:135_2: lokiyesu pana kāmāvacarakusalesveva kadāci sandissanti visuṃ visuṃ.
tika-abh07t:136_1: Appamaññāyo pana dvādasasu pañcamajjhānavajjitamahaggatacittesu ceva kāmāvacarakusalesu ca sahetukakāmāvacarakiriyacittesu
tika-abh07t:136_2: cāti aṭṭhavīsaticittesveva kadāci nānā hutvā jāyanti,
tika-abh07t:136_3: upekkhāsahagatesu panettha karuṇāmuditā na santīti keci vadanti.
tika-abh07t:137_1: Paññā pana dvādasasu ñāṇasampayuttakāmāvacaracittesu ceva sabbesupi pañcatiṃsamahaggatalokuttaracittesu
tika-abh07t:143_0: Nānā kadāci māno ca, thina middhaṃ tathā saha.
tika-abh07t:152_1: Lokuttaresu tāva aṭṭhasu paṭhamajjhānikacittesu aññasamānā terasa cetasikā,
tika-abh07t:152_2: appamaññāvajjitā tevīsati sobhanacetasikā ceti chattiṃsa dhammā saṅgahaṃ gacchanti,
tika-abh07t:152_6: pañcamajjhānikacittesupi upekkhāsahagatā te eva saṅgayhantīti sabbathāpi aṭṭhasu lokuttaracittesu pañcakajjhānavasena pañcadhāva saṅgaho hotīti.
tika-abh07t:156_1: Mahaggatesu pana tīsu paṭhamajjhānikacittesu tāva aññasamānā terasa cetasikā,
tika-abh07t:156_2: viratittayavajjitā dvāvīsati sobhanacetasikā ceti pañcatiṃsa dhammā saṅgahaṃ gacchanti,
tika-abh07t:156_7: pañcamajjhānikacittesu pana pannarasasu appamaññāyo na labbhantīti sabbathāpi sattavīsatimahaggatacittesu
tika-abh07t:160_1: Kāmāvacarasobhanesu pana kusalesu tāva paṭhamadvaye aññasamānā terasa cetasikā,
tika-abh07t:160_2: pañcavīsati sobhanacetasikā ceti aṭṭhatiṃsa dhammā saṅgahaṃ gacchanti,
tika-abh07t:160_7: Kiriyacittesupi virativajjitā tatheva catūsupi dukesu catudhāva saṅgayhanti.
tika-abh07t:160_8: Tathā vipākesu ca appamaññāvirativajjitā te eva saṅgayhantīti sabbathāpi catuvīsatikāmāvacarasobhanacittesu dukavasena dvādasadhāva saṅgaho hotīti.
tika-abh07t:170_1: Akusalesu pana lobhamūlesu tāva paṭhame asaṅkhārike aññasamānā terasa cetasikā,
tika-abh07t:170_2: akusalasādhāraṇā cattāro cāti sattarasa lobhadiṭṭhīhi saddhiṃ ekūnavīsati dhammā saṅgahaṃ gacchanti.
tika-abh07t:172_0: 45. Tatiye tatheva pītivajjitā lobhadiṭṭhīhi saha aṭṭhārasa.
tika-abh07t:174_1: Pañcame pana paṭighasampayutte asaṅkhārike doso issā macchariyaṃ kukkuccañcāti catūhi saddhiṃ pītivajjitā te eva vīsati dhammā saṅgayhanti,
tika-abh07t:176_2: akusalasādhāraṇā cattāro cāti pannarasa dhammā uddhaccasahagate sampayujjanti.
tika-abh07t:177_1: Vicikicchāsahagatacitte ca adhimokkhavirahitā vicikicchāsahagatā tatheva pannarasa dhammā samupalabbhantīti
tika-abh07t:177_2: sabbathāpi dvādasākusalacittuppādesu paccekaṃ yojiyamānāpi gaṇanavasena sattadhāva saṅgahitā bhavantīti.
tika-abh07t:180_0: 52. Sādhāraṇā ca cattāro, samānā ca dasāpare.
tika-abh07t:183_0: 53. Ahetukesu pana hasanacitte tāva chandavajjitā aññasamānā dvādasa dhammā saṅgahaṃ gacchanti.
tika-abh07t:187_1: Dvipañcaviññāṇe pakiṇṇakavajjitā teyeva saṅgayhantīti sabbathāpi aṭṭhārasasu ahetukesu gaṇanavasena catudhāva saṅgaho hotīti.
tika-abh07t:202_1: Tattha vedanāsaṅgahe tāva tividhā vedanā sukhaṃ dukkhaṃ adukkhamasukhā ceti,
tika-abh07t:202_2: sukhaṃ dukkhaṃ somanassaṃ domanassaṃ upekkhāti ca bhedena pana pañcadhā hoti.
tika-abh07t:203_0: 4. Tattha sukhasahagataṃ kusalavipākaṃ kāyaviññāṇamekameva, tathā dukkhasahagataṃ akusalavipākaṃ.
tika-abh07t:204_3: sukhasantīraṇahasanāni ca dveti aṭṭhārasa kāmāvacarasomanassasahagatacittāni ceva paṭhamadutiyatatiyacatutthajjhānasaṅkhātāni
tika-abh07t:212_0: 10. Hetusaṅgahe hetū nāma lobho doso moho alobho adoso amoho cāti chabbidhā bhavanti.
tika-abh07t:216_1: Sesāni dasa akusalacittāni ceva ñāṇavippayuttāni dvādasa kāmāvacarasobhanāni ceti dvāvīsati dvihetukacittāni.
tika-abh07t:217_1: Dvādasa ñāṇasampayuttakāmāvacarasobhanāni ceva pañcatiṃsa mahaggatalokuttaracittāni ceti sattacattālīsa tihetukacittānīti.
tika-abh07t:227_1: Tattha dve upekkhāsahagatasantīraṇāni ceva aṭṭha mahāvipākāni ca nava rūpārūpavipākāni ceti ekūnavīsati cittāni paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutikiccāni nāma.
tika-abh07t:233_0: 26. Aṭṭha mahāvipākāni ceva santīraṇattayañceti ekādasa tadārammaṇakiccāni.
tika-abh07t:234_1: Tesu pana dve upekkhāsahagatasantīraṇacittāni paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutitadārammaṇasantīraṇavasena pañcakiccāni nāma.
tika-abh07t:242_0: 34. Aṭṭhasaṭṭhi tathā dve ca, navāṭṭha dve yathākkamaṃ.
tika-abh07t:245_1: Dvārasaṅgahe dvārāni nāma cakkhudvāraṃ sotadvāraṃ ghānadvāraṃ jivhādvāraṃ kāyadvāraṃ manodvārañceti chabbidhāni bhavanti.
tika-abh07t:249_3: tathā pañcadvārāvajjanasotaviññāṇādivasena sotadvārādīsupi chacattālīseva bhavantīti sabbathāpi pañcadvāre catupaññāsa cittāni kāmāvacarāneva.
tika-abh07t:252_1: Tesu pana pañcaviññāṇāni ceva mahaggatalokuttarajavanāni ceti chattiṃsa yathārahamekadvārikacittāni nāma.
tika-abh07t:262_1: Ālambaṇasaṅgahe ārammaṇāni nāma rūpārammaṇaṃ saddārammaṇaṃ gandhārammaṇaṃ rasārammaṇaṃ phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ dhammārammaṇañceti chabbidhāni bhavanti.
tika-abh07t:263_0: 49. Tattha rūpameva rūpārammaṇaṃ, tathā saddādayo saddārammaṇādīni.
tika-abh07t:266_1: Manodvārikacittānaṃ pana chabbidhampi paccuppannamatītaṃ anāgataṃ kālavimuttañca yathārahamārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t:267_1: Dvāravimuttānañca paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutisaṅkhātānaṃ chabbidhampi yathāsambhavaṃ yebhuyyena bhavantare
tika-abh07t:267_2: chadvāraggahitaṃ paccuppannamatītaṃ paññattibhūtaṃ vā kammakammanimittagatinimittasammataṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t:280_0: Pañca sabbattha chacceti, sattadhā tattha saṅgaho.
tika-abh07t:282_0: 64. Vatthusaṅgahe vatthūni nāma cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyahadayavatthu ceti chabbidhāni bhavanti.
tika-abh07t:286_0: 68. Tattha pañcaviññāṇadhātuyo yathākkamaṃ ekantena pañca pasādavatthūni nissāyeva pavattanti.
tika-abh07t:287_0: 69. Pañcadvārāvajjanasampaṭicchanasaṅkhātā pana manodhātu ca hadayaṃ nissitāyeva pavattanti.
tika-abh07t:288_1: Avasesā pana manoviññāṇadhātusaṅkhātā ca santīraṇamahāvipākapaṭighadvayapaṭhamamaggahasanarūpāvacaravasena hadayaṃ nissāyeva pavattanti.
tika-abh07t:289_0: 71. Avasesā kusalākusalakiriyānuttaravasena pana nissāya vā anissāya vā.
tika-abh07t:291_0: 73. Chavatthuṃ nissitā kāme, satta rūpe catubbidhā.
tika-abh07t:302_0: 2.. Vīthimuttānaṃ pana kammakammanimittagatinimittavasena tividhā hoti visayappavatti.
tika-abh07t:305_1: Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ sotaviññāṇaṃ ghānaviññāṇaṃ jivhāviññāṇaṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ manoviññāṇañceti cha viññāṇāni.
tika-abh07t:307_1: Cha vīthiyo pana cakkhudvāravīthi sotadvāravīthi ghānadvāravīthi jivhādvāravīthi kāyadvāravīthi manodvāravīthi ceti dvāravasena vā,
tika-abh07t:307_2: cakkhuviññāṇavīthi sotaviññāṇavīthi ghānaviññāṇavīthi jivhāviññāṇavīthi kāyaviññāṇavīthi manoviññāṇavīthi
tika-abh07t:307_3: ceti viññāṇavasena vā dvārappavattā cittappavattiyo yojetabbā.
tika-abh07t:309_1: Atimahantaṃ mahantaṃ parittaṃ atiparittañceti pañcadvāre manodvāre pana vibhūtamavibhūtañceti chadhā visayappavatti veditabbā.
tika-abh07t:313_1: Ekacittakkhaṇātītāni vā bahucittakkhaṇātītāni vā ṭhitippattāneva pañcārammaṇāni pañcadvāre āpāthamāgacchanti.
tika-abh07t:313_2: Tasmā yadi ekacittakkhaṇātītakaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ cakkhussa āpāthamāgacchati,
tika-abh07t:313_3: tato dvikkhattuṃ bhavaṅge calite bhavaṅgasotaṃ vocchinditvā tameva rūpārammaṇaṃ āvajjantaṃ pañcadvārāvajjanacittaṃ uppajjitvā nirujjhati,
tika-abh07t:313_4: tato tassānantaraṃ tameva rūpaṃ passantaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ,
tika-abh07t:313_8: tato paraṃ ekūnatiṃsa kāmāvacarajavanesu yaṃkiñci laddhapaccayaṃ yebhuyyena sattakkhattuṃ javati,
tika-abh07t:313_9: javanānubandhāni ca dve tadārammaṇapākāni yathārahaṃ pavattanti,
tika-abh07t:315_1: Yāva tadārammaṇuppādā pana appahontātītakamāpāthamāgataṃ ārammaṇaṃ mahantaṃ nāma,
tika-abh07t:316_1: Yāva javanuppādāpi appahontātītakamāpāthamāgataṃ ārammaṇaṃ parittaṃ nāma,
tika-abh07t:316_2: tattha javanampi anuppajjitvā dvattikkhattuṃ voṭṭhabbanameva pavattati,
tika-abh07t:317_1: Yāva voṭṭhabbanuppādā ca pana appahontātītakamāpāthamāgataṃ nirodhāsannamārammaṇaṃ atiparittaṃ nāma,
tika-abh07t:318_2: tathā sotadvārādīsu ceti sabbathāpi pañcadvāre tadārammaṇajavanavoṭṭhabbanamoghavārasaṅkhātānaṃ catunnaṃ
tika-abh07t:318_3: vārānaṃ yathākkamaṃ ārammaṇabhūtā visayappavatti catudhā veditabbā.
tika-abh07t:324_0: 18. Avibhūte panārammaṇe javanāvasāne bhavaṅgapātova hoti, natthi tadārammaṇuppādoti.
tika-abh07t:329_0: 20. Appanājavanavāre pana vibhūtāvibhūtabhedo natthi, tathā tadārammaṇuppādo ca.
tika-abh07t:330_2: catukkhattuṃ tikkhattumeva vā yathākkamaṃ uppajjitvā niruddhānantarameva yathārahaṃ catutthaṃ,
tika-abh07t:330_3: pañcamaṃ vā chabbīsatimahaggatalokuttarajavanesu yathābhinīhāravasena yaṃ kiñci javanaṃ appanāvīthimotarati,
tika-abh07t:341_1: Domanassasahagatajavanāvasāne ca pana tadārammaṇāniceva bhavaṅgāni ca upekkhāsahagatāneva bhavanti,
tika-abh07t:341_2: tasmā yadi somanassapaṭisandhikassa domanassasahagatajavanāvasāne tadārammaṇasambhavo natthi,
tika-abh07t:341_3: tadā yaṃ kiñci paricitapubbaṃ parittārammaṇamārabbha upekkhāsahagatasantīraṇaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh07t:342_1: Tathā kāmāvacarajavanāvasāne kāmāvacarasattānaṃ kāmāvacaradhammesveva ārammaṇabhūtesu tadārammaṇaṃ icchantīti.
tika-abh07t:347_0: 31. Javanesu ca parittajavanavīthiyaṃ kāmāvacarajavanāni sattakkhattuṃ chakkhattumeva vā javanti.
tika-abh07t:349_1: Bhagavato pana yamakapāṭihāriyakālādīsu lahukappavattiyaṃ cattāripañca vā paccavekkhaṇacittāni bhavantītipi vadanti.
tika-abh07t:350_1: Ādikammikassa pana paṭhamakappanāyaṃ mahaggatajavanāniabhiññājavanāni ca sabbadāpi ekavārameva javanti,
tika-abh07t:351_2: tato paraṃ dve tīṇi phalacittāni yathārahaṃ uppajjanti,
tika-abh07t:352_0: 36. Nirodhasamāpattikāle dvikkhattuṃ catutthāruppajavanaṃ javati, tato paraṃ nirodhaṃ phusati.
tika-abh07t:353_1: Vuṭṭhānakāle ca anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arahattaphalaṃ vā yathārahamekavāraṃ uppajjitvā niruddhe bhavaṅgapātova hoti.
tika-abh07t:354_0: 38. Sabbatthāpi samāpattivīthiyaṃ bhavaṅgasoto viya vīthiniyamo natthīti katvā bahūnipi labbhantīti.
tika-abh07t:359_0: 40. Duhetukānamahetukānañca panettha kiriyajavanāni ceva appanājavanāni ca labbhanti.
tika-abh07t:361_0: 42. Duggatiyaṃ pana ñāṇavippayuttāni ca mahāvipākāni na labbhanti.
tika-abh07t:362_0: 43. Tihetukesu ca khīṇāsavānaṃ kusalākusalajavanāni na labbhanti.
tika-abh07t:365_0: 46. Anāgāmipuggalānaṃ pana paṭighajavanāni ca na labbhanti.
tika-abh07t:374_0: 52. Sabbatthāpi ca taṃtaṃpasādarahitānaṃ taṃtaṃdvārikavīthicittāni na labbhanteva.
tika-abh07t:379_0: 55. Iccevaṃ chadvārikacittappavatti yathāsambhavaṃ bhavaṅgantaritā yāvatāyukamabbocchinnā pavattati.
tika-abh07t:385_4: catudhā maraṇuppatti ceti vīthimuttasaṅgahe cattāri catukkāni veditabbāni.
tika-abh07t:387_0: 3. Tattha apāyabhūmi kāmasugatibhūmi rūpāvacarabhūmi arūpāvacarabhūmi ceti catasso bhūmiyo nāma.
tika-abh07t:388_0: 4. Tāsu nirayo tiracchānayoni pettivisayo asurakāyo ceti apāyabhūmi catubbidhā hoti.
tika-abh07t:389_1: Manussā cātumahārājikā tāvatiṃsā yāmā tusitā nimmānarati paranimmitavasavattī ceti kāmasugatibhūmi sattavidhā hoti.
tika-abh07t:394_0: 10. Vehapphalā asaññasattā suddhāvāsā ceti catutthajjhānabhūmīti rūpāvacarabhūmi soḷasavidhā hoti.
tika-abh07t:395_0: 11. Avihā atappā sudassā sudassī akaniṭṭhā ceti suddhāvāsabhūmi pañcavidhā hoti.
tika-abh07t:396_1: Ākāsānañcāyatanabhūmi viññāṇañcāyatanabhūmi ākiñcaññāyatanabhūmi nevasaññānāsaññāyatanabhūmi ceti arūpabhūmi catubbidhā hoti.
tika-abh07t:403_1: Apāyapaṭisandhi kāmasugatipaṭisandhi rūpāvacarapaṭisandhi arūpāvacarapaṭisandhi ceti catubbidhā paṭisandhi nāma.
tika-abh07t:404_1: Tattha akusalavipākopekkhāsahagatasantīraṇaṃ apāyabhūmiyaṃ okkantikkhaṇe paṭisandhi hutvā tato paraṃ bhavaṅgaṃ pariyosāne cavanaṃ hutvā vocchijjati,
tika-abh07t:405_1: Kusalavipākopekkhāsahagatasantīraṇaṃ pana kāmasugatiyaṃ manussānañceva jaccandhādīnaṃ bhummassitānañca
tika-abh07t:406_0: 18. Mahāvipākāni pana aṭṭha sabbatthāpi kāmasugatiyaṃ paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutivasena pavattanti.
tika-abh07t:408_0: 20. Sā panāyaṃ dasavidhāpi kāmāvacarapaṭisandhicceva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
tika-abh07t:409_0: 21. Tesu catunnaṃ apāyānaṃ manussānaṃ vinipātikāsurānañca āyuppamāṇagaṇanāya niyamo natthi.
tika-abh07t:410_1: Cātumahārājikānaṃ pana devānaṃ dibbāni pañcavassasatāni āyuppamāṇaṃ,
tika-abh07t:417_2: Tathā tato paraṃ pavattiyaṃ cavanakāle ca rūpameva pavattitvā nirujjhati,
tika-abh07t:418_0: 29. Tesu brahmapārisajjānaṃ devānaṃ kappassa tatiyo bhāgo āyuppamāṇaṃ.
tika-abh07t:434_0: 45. Tesu pana ākāsānañcāyatanūpagānaṃ devānaṃ vīsatikappasahassāni āyuppamāṇaṃ.
tika-abh07t:444_1: Diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ upapajjavedanīyaṃ aparāpariyavedanīyaṃ ahosikammañceti pākakālavasena cattāri kammāni nāma.
tika-abh07t:445_0: 53. Tathā akusalaṃ kāmāvacarakusalaṃ rūpāvacarakusalaṃ arūpāvacarakusalañceti pākaṭhānavasena.
tika-abh07t:446_0: 54. Tattha akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ manokammañceti kammadvāravasena tividhaṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t:447_1: Pāṇātipāto adinnādānaṃ kāmesumicchācāro ceti kāyaviññattisaṅkhāte kāyadvāre bāhullavuttito kāyakammaṃ nāma.
tika-abh07t:448_1: Musāvādo pisuṇavācā pharusavācā samphappalāpo ceti vacīviññattisaṅkhāte vacīdvāre bāhullavuttito vacīkammaṃ nāma.
tika-abh07t:449_1: Abhijjhā byāpādo micchādiṭṭhi ceti aññatrāpi viññattiyā manasmiṃyeva bāhullavuttito manokammaṃ nāma.
tika-abh07t:450_0: 58. Tesu pāṇātipāto pharusavācā byāpādo ca dosamūlena jāyanti.
tika-abh07t:453_0: 61. Cittuppādavasena panetaṃ akusalaṃ sabbathāpi dvādasavidhaṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t:454_3: manodvāre pavattaṃ manokammañceti kammadvāravasena tividhaṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t:458_0: 66. Taṃ panetaṃ vīsatividhampi kāmāvacarakammamicceva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
tika-abh07t:461_2: pavattiyaṃ pana sabbampi dvādasavidhaṃ sattākusalapākāni sabbatthāpi kāmaloke rūpaloke ca yathārahaṃ vipaccati.
tika-abh07t:462_3: ahetukavipākāni pana aṭṭhapi sabbatthāpi kāmaloke rūpaloke ca yathārahaṃ vipaccati.
tika-abh07t:463_1: Tatthāpi tihetukamukkaṭṭhaṃ kusalaṃ tihetukaṃ paṭisandhiṃ datvā pavatte soḷasa vipākāni vipaccati.
tika-abh07t:464_1: Tihetukamomakaṃ dvihetukamukkaṭṭhañca kusalaṃ dvihetukaṃ paṭisandhiṃ datvā pavatte tihetukarahitāni dvādasa vipākāni vipaccati.
tika-abh07t:465_1: Dvihetukamomakaṃ pana kusalaṃ ahetukameva paṭisandhiṃ deti,
tika-abh07t:468_0: Tesaṃ dvādasa pākāni, dasāṭṭha ca yathākkamaṃ;
tika-abh07t:470_0: 75. Rūpāvacarakusalaṃ pana paṭhamajjhānaṃ parittaṃ bhāvetvā brahmapārisajjesu uppajjati.
tika-abh07t:473_0: 78. Tathā dutiyajjhānaṃ tatiyajjhānañca parittaṃ bhāvetvā parittābhesu.
tika-abh07t:487_0: 89. Āyukkhayena kammakkhayena ubhayakkhayena upacchedakakammunā ceti catudhā maraṇuppatti nāma.
tika-abh07t:488_1: Tathā ca marantānaṃ pana maraṇakāle yathārahaṃ abhimukhībhūtaṃ bhavantare paṭisandhijanakaṃ kammaṃ vā,
tika-abh07t:488_3: anantaramuppajjamānabhave upalabhitabbamupabhogabhūtañca gatinimittaṃ vā kammabalena channaṃ dvārānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ paccupaṭṭhāti,
tika-abh07t:488_4: tato paraṃ tameva tathopaṭṭhitaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārabbha vipaccamānakakammānurūpaṃ parisuddhaṃ upakkiliṭṭhaṃ
tika-abh07t:488_5: vā upalabhitabbabhavānurūpaṃ tatthoṇataṃva cittasantānaṃ abhiṇhaṃ pavattati bāhullena,
tika-abh07t:488_6: tameva vā pana janakabhūtaṃ kammaṃ abhinavakaraṇavasena dvārappattaṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t:489_1: Paccāsannamaraṇassa tassa vīthicittāvasāne bhavaṅgakkhaye vā cavanavasena paccuppannabhavapariyosānabhūtaṃ cuticittaṃ uppajjitvā nirujjhati,
tika-abh07t:489_2: tasmiṃ niruddhāvasāne tassānantarameva tathāgahitaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārabbha savatthukaṃ avatthukameva vā yathārahaṃ
tika-abh07t:489_3: avijjānusayaparikkhittena taṇhānusayamūlakena saṅkhārena janiyamānaṃ sampayuttehi pariggayhamānaṃ sahajātānamadhiṭṭhānabhāvena
tika-abh07t:489_4: pubbaṅgamabhūtaṃ bhavantarapaṭisandhānavasena paṭisandhisaṅkhātaṃ mānasaṃ uppajjamānameva patiṭṭhāti
tika-abh07t:490_1: Maraṇāsannavīthiyaṃ panettha mandappavattāni pañceva javanāni pāṭikaṅkhitabbāni,
tika-abh07t:490_2: tasmā yadi paccuppannārammaṇesu āpāthagatesu dharantesveva maraṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh07t:490_3: tadā paṭisandhibhavaṅgānampi paccuppannārammaṇatā labbhatīti katvā kāmāvacarapaṭisandhiyā chadvāraggahitaṃ
tika-abh07t:492_1: Tathā arūpapaṭisandhiyā ca mahaggatabhūtaṃ paññattibhūtañca kammanimittameva yathārahamārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t:501_1: Iccevaṃ gahitapaṭisandhikānaṃ pana paṭisandhinirodhānantarato pabhuti tamevārammaṇamārabbha tadeva cittaṃ
tika-abh07t:501_2: yāva cuticittuppādā asati vīthicittuppāde bhavassa aṅgabhāvena bhavaṅgasantatisaṅkhātaṃ mānasaṃ abbocchinnaṃ
tika-abh07t:502_0: 100. Pariyosāne ca cavanavasena cuticittaṃ hutvā nirujjhati.
tika-abh07t:503_0: 101. Tato parañca paṭisandhādayo rathacakkamiva yathākkamaṃ eva parivattantā pavattanti.
tika-abh07t:516_2: catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyarūpanti duvidhampetaṃ rūpaṃ ekādasavidhena saṅgahaṃ gacchati.
tika-abh07t:517_0: 4. Kathaṃ? Pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātu bhūtarūpaṃ nāma.
tika-abh07t:518_0: 5. Cakkhu sotaṃ ghānaṃ jivhā kāyo pasādarūpaṃ nāma.
tika-abh07t:519_0: 6. Rūpaṃ saddo gandho raso āpodhātuvivajjitaṃ bhūtattayasaṅkhātaṃ phoṭṭhabbaṃ gocararūpaṃ nāma.
tika-abh07t:524_1: Iti ca aṭṭhārasavidhampetaṃ rūpaṃ sabhāvarūpaṃ salakkhaṇarūpaṃ nipphannarūpaṃ rūparūpaṃ sammasanarūpanti ca saṅgahaṃ gacchati.
tika-abh07t:527_0: 14. Rūpassa lahutā mudutā kammaññatā viññattidvayaṃ vikārarūpaṃ nāma.
tika-abh07t:528_0: 15. Rūpassa upacayo santati jaratā aniccatā lakkhaṇarūpaṃ nāma.
tika-abh07t:529_1: Jātirūpameva panettha upacayasantatināmena pavuccatīti ekādasavidhampetaṃ rūpaṃ aṭṭhavīsatividhaṃ hoti sarūpavasena.
tika-abh07t:533_0: Paricchedo ca viññatti, vikāro lakkhaṇanti ca;
tika-abh07t:537_1: Sabbañca panetaṃ rūpaṃ ahetukaṃ sappaccayaṃ sāsavaṃ saṅkhataṃ lokiyaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ anārammaṇaṃ appahātabbamevāti
tika-abh07t:538_0: 19. Kathaṃ? Pasādasaṅkhātaṃ pañcavidhampi ajjhattikarūpaṃ nāma, itaraṃ bāhirarūpaṃ.
tika-abh07t:539_0: 20. Pasādahadayasaṅkhātaṃ chabbidhampi vatthurūpaṃ nāma, itaraṃ avatthurūpaṃ.
tika-abh07t:540_0: 21. Pasādaviññattisaṅkhātaṃ sattavidhampi dvārarūpaṃ nāma, itaraṃ advārarūpaṃ.
tika-abh07t:541_0: 22. Pasādabhāvajīvitasaṅkhātaṃ aṭṭhavidhampi indriyarūpaṃ nāma, itaraṃ anindriyarūpaṃ.
tika-abh07t:546_0: 27. Vaṇṇo gandho raso ojā bhūtacatukkañceti aṭṭhavidhampi avinibbhogarūpaṃ, itaraṃ vinibbhogarūpaṃ.
tika-abh07t:551_0: 29. Kammaṃ cittaṃ utu āhāro ceti cattāri rūpasamuṭṭhānāni nāma.
tika-abh07t:552_1: Tattha kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacarañceti pañcavīsatividhampi kusalākusalakammamabhisaṅkhataṃ ajjhattikasantāne
tika-abh07t:553_1: Arūpavipākadvipañcaviññāṇavajjitaṃ pañcasattatividhampi cittaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ paṭhamabhavaṅgamupādāya jāyantameva samuṭṭhāpeti.
tika-abh07t:557_1: Sītuṇhotusamaññātā tejodhātu ṭhitippattāva utusamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca yathārahaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
tika-abh07t:558_0: 36. Ojāsaṅkhāto āhāro āhārasamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ ajjhoharaṇakāle ṭhānappattova samuṭṭhāpeti.
tika-abh07t:563_0: 41. Avinibbhogarūpāni ceva ākāsadhātu ca. Catūhi sambhūtāni.
tika-abh07t:571_0: 45. Ekuppādā ekanirodhā ekanissayā sahavuttino ekavīsati rūpakalāpā nāma.
tika-abh07t:572_1: Tattha jīvitaṃ avinibbhogarūpañca cakkhunā saha cakkhudasakanti pavuccati.
tika-abh07t:572_2: Tathā sotādīhi saddhiṃ sotadasakaṃ ghānadasakaṃ jivhādasakaṃ kāyadasakaṃ itthibhāvadasakaṃ pumbhāvadasakaṃ vatthudasakañceti yathākkamaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t:574_1: Suddhaṭṭhakaṃ saddanavakaṃ lahutādekādasakaṃ saddalahutādidvādasakañceti cattāro utusamuṭṭhānakalāpā.
tika-abh07t:576_1: Tattha suddhaṭṭhakaṃ saddanavakañceti dve utusamuṭṭhānakalāpā bahiddhāpi labbhanti,
tika-abh07t:578_0: Nava cha caturo dveti, kalāpā ekavīsati.
tika-abh07t:583_0: 52. Sabbānipi panetāni rūpāni kāmaloke yathārahaṃ anūnāni pavattiyaṃ upalabbhanti.
tika-abh07t:584_1: Paṭisandhiyaṃ pana saṃsedajānañceva opapātikānañca cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyabhāvavatthudasakasaṅkhātāni satta dasakāni pātubhavanti ukkaṭṭhavasena,
tika-abh07t:584_2: omakavasena pana cakkhusotaghānabhāvadasakāni kadācipi na labbhanti,
tika-abh07t:585_1: Gabbhaseyyakasattānaṃ pana kāyabhāvavatthudasakasaṅkhātāni tīṇi dasakāni pātubhavanti,
tika-abh07t:585_3: tato paraṃ pavattikāle kamena cakkhudasakādīni ca pātubhavanti.
tika-abh07t:586_4: ojāpharaṇamupādāya āhārasamuṭṭhānā ceti catusamuṭṭhānarūpakalāpasantati kāmaloke dīpajālā viya,
tika-abh07t:587_1: Maraṇakāle pana cuticittoparisattarasamacittassa ṭhitikālamupādāya kammajarūpāni na uppajjanti,
tika-abh07t:587_2: puretaramuppannāni ca kammajarūpāni cuticittasamakālameva pavattitvā nirujjhanti,
tika-abh07t:587_4: tato paraṃ utusamuṭṭhānarūpaparamparā yāva matakaḷevarasaṅkhātā pavattanti.
tika-abh07t:590_1: Rūpaloke pana ghānajivhākāyabhāvadasakāni ca āhārajakalāpāni ca na labbhanti,
tika-abh07t:590_2: tasmā tesaṃ paṭisandhikāle cakkhusotavatthuvasena tīṇi dasakāni jīvitanavakañceti cattāro kammasamuṭṭhānakalāpā,
tika-abh07t:592_1: Iccevaṃ kāmarūpāsaññīsaṅkhātesu tīsu ṭhānesu paṭisandhipavattivasena duvidhā rūpappavatti veditabbā.
tika-abh07t:596_0: Na labbhanti pavatte tu, na kiñcipi na labbhati.
tika-abh07t:599_1: Nibbānaṃ pana lokuttarasaṅkhātaṃ catumaggañāṇena sacchikātabbaṃ maggaphalānamārammaṇabhūtaṃ vānasaṅkhātāya taṇhāya nikkhantattā nibbānanti pavuccati.
tika-abh07t:600_1: Tadetaṃ sabhāvato ekavidhampi saupādisesanibbānadhātu anupādisesanibbānadhātu ceti duvidhaṃ hoti kāraṇapariyāyena.
tika-abh07t:601_0: 64. Tathā suññataṃ animittaṃ appaṇihitañceti tividhaṃ hoti ākārabhedena.
tika-abh07t:611_1: Akusalasaṅgaho missakasaṅgaho bodhipakkhiyasaṅgaho sabbasaṅgaho ceti samuccayasaṅgaho catubbidho veditabbo.
tika-abh07t:613_0: 3. Kathaṃ? Akusalasaṅgahe tāva cattāro āsavā – kāmāsavo bhavāsavo diṭṭhāsavo avijjāsavo.
tika-abh07t:614_0: 4. Cattāro oghā – kāmogho bhavogho diṭṭhogho avijjogho.
tika-abh07t:615_0: 5. Cattāro yogā – kāmayogo bhavayogo diṭṭhiyogo avijjāyogo.
tika-abh07t:617_0: 7. Cattāro upādānā – kāmupādānaṃ diṭṭhupādānaṃ sīlabbatupādānaṃ attavādupādānaṃ.
tika-abh07t:618_2: kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ byāpādanīvaraṇaṃ thinamiddhanīvaraṇaṃ uddhaccakukkuccanīvaraṇaṃ vicikicchānīvaraṇaṃ avijjānīvaraṇaṃ.
tika-abh07t:619_2: kāmarāgānusayo bhavarāgānusayo paṭighānusayo mānānusayo diṭṭhānusayo vicikicchānusayo avijjānusayo.
tika-abh07t:620_2: kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ rūparāgasaṃyojanaṃ arūparāgasaṃyojanaṃ paṭighasaṃyojanaṃ mānasaṃyojanaṃ diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ
tika-abh07t:621_2: kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ bhavarāgasaṃyojanaṃ paṭighasaṃyojanaṃ mānasaṃyojanaṃ diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ sīlabbataparāmāsasaṃyojanaṃ
tika-abh07t:622_0: 12. Dasa kilesā – lobho doso moho māno diṭṭhi vicikicchā thinaṃ uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ.
tika-abh07t:623_1: Āsavādīsu panettha kāmabhavanāmena tabbatthukā taṇhā adhippetā,
tika-abh07t:623_2: sīlabbataparāmāso idaṃsaccābhiniveso attavādupādo ca tathāpavattaṃ diṭṭhigatameva pavuccati.
tika-abh07t:631_0: 15. Missakasaṅgahe cha hetū – lobho doso moho alobho adoso amoho.
tika-abh07t:632_0: 16. Satta jhānaṅgāni – vitakko vicāro pīti ekaggatā somanassaṃ domanassaṃ upekkhā.
tika-abh07t:633_2: sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sammāsamādhi micchādiṭṭhi
tika-abh07t:634_2: cakkhundriyaṃ sotindriyaṃ ghānindriyaṃ jivhindriyaṃ kāyindriyaṃ itthindriyaṃ purisindriyaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ
tika-abh07t:634_3: manindriyaṃ sukhindriyaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ somanassindriyaṃ domanassindriyaṃ upekkhindriyaṃ saddhindriyaṃ
tika-abh07t:634_4: vīriyindriyaṃ satindriyaṃ samādhindriyaṃ paññindriyaṃ anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ aññindriyaṃ aññātāvindriyaṃ.
tika-abh07t:635_2: saddhābalaṃ vīriyabalaṃ satibalaṃ samādhibalaṃ paññābalaṃ hiribalaṃ ottappabalaṃ ahirikabalaṃ anottappabalaṃ.
tika-abh07t:636_0: 20. Cattāro adhipatī – chandādhipati vīriyādhipati cittādhipati vīmaṃsādhipati.
tika-abh07t:637_0: 21. Cattāro āhārā – kabaḷīkāro āhāro, phasso dutiyo, manosañcetanā tatiyā, viññāṇaṃ catutthaṃ.
tika-abh07t:642_0: 26. Pañcaviññāṇesu jhānaṅgāni, avīriyesu balāni, ahetukesu maggaṅgāni na labbhanti.
tika-abh07t:643_0: 27. Tathā vicikicchācitte ekaggatā maggindriyabalabhāvaṃ na gacchati.
tika-abh07t:645_0: 29. Cha hetū pañca jhānaṅgā, maggaṅgā nava vatthuto.
tika-abh07t:650_1: Bodhipakkhiyasaṅgahe cattāro satipaṭṭhānā kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ vedanānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ cittānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh07t:651_1: Cattāro sammappadhānā uppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ pahānāya vāyāmo,
tika-abh07t:652_0: 32. Cattāro iddhipādā – chandiddhipādo vīriyiddhipādo cittiddhipādo vīmaṃsiddhipādo.
tika-abh07t:653_0: 33. Pañcindriyāni – saddhindriyaṃ vīriyindriyaṃ satindriyaṃ samādhindriyaṃ paññindriyaṃ.
tika-abh07t:654_0: 34. Pañca balāni – saddhābalaṃ vīriyabalaṃ satibalaṃ samādhibalaṃ paññābalaṃ.
tika-abh07t:655_2: satisambojjhaṅgo dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo pītisambojjhaṅgo passaddhisambojjhaṅgo samādhisambojjhaṅgo upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo.
tika-abh07t:656_2: sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sammāsamādhi.
tika-abh07t:657_0: 37. Ettha pana cattāro satipaṭṭhānāti sammāsati ekāva pavuccati.
tika-abh07t:669_0: 41. Sabbe lokuttare honti, na vā saṅkappapītiyo.
tika-abh07t:674_2: cakkhāyatanaṃ sotāyatanaṃ ghānāyatanaṃ jivhāyatanaṃ kāyāyatanaṃ manāyatanaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ saddāyatanaṃ
tika-abh07t:675_2: cakkhudhātu sotadhātu ghānadhātu jivhādhātu kāyadhātu rūpadhātu saddadhātu gandhadhātu rasadhātu phoṭṭhabbadhātu
tika-abh07t:675_3: cakkhuviññāṇadhātu sotaviññāṇadhātu ghānaviññāṇadhātu jivhāviññāṇadhātu kāyaviññāṇadhātu manodhātu dhammadhātu
tika-abh07t:677_1: Ettha pana cetasikasukhumarūpanibbānavasena ekūnasattati dhammā dhammāyatanadhammadhātūti saṅkhaṃ gacchanti.
tika-abh07t:685_0: 52. Dukkhaṃ tebhūmakaṃ vaṭṭaṃ, taṇhā samudayo bhave.
tika-abh07t:686_0: Nirodho nāma nibbānaṃ, maggo lokuttaro mato.
tika-abh07t:692_0: 1. Yesaṃ saṅkhatadhammānaṃ, ye dhammā paccayā yathā.
tika-abh07t:694_0: 2. Paṭiccasamuppādanayo paṭṭhānanayo ceti paccayasaṅgaho duvidho veditabbo.
tika-abh07t:697_12: Evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotīti ayamettha paṭiccasamuppādanayo.
tika-abh07t:698_1: Tattha tayo addhā dvādasaṅgāni vīsatākārā tisandhi catusaṅkhepā tīṇi vaṭṭāni dve mūlāni ca veditabbāni.
tika-abh07t:699_3: majjhe aṭṭha paccuppanno addhāti tayo addhā.

tika-abh07t:716_0: Ekadhā puna rūpassa, rūpaṃ nāmassa cekadhā.
tika-abh07t:718_0: Dvayassa navadhā ceti, chabbidhā paccayā kathaṃ.
tika-abh07t:719_1: Anantaraniruddhā cittacetasikā dhammā paṭuppannānaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ dhammānaṃ anantarasamanantaranatthivigatavasena,
tika-abh07t:719_3: sahajātā cittacetasikā dhammā aññamaññaṃ sampayuttavaseneti ca chadhā nāmaṃ nāmassa paccayo hoti.
tika-abh07t:720_4: vipākakkhandhā aññamaññaṃ sahajātānaṃ rūpānaṃ vipākavaseneti ca pañcadhā nāmaṃ nāmarūpānaṃ paccayo hoti.
tika-abh07t:721_1: Pacchājātā cittacetasikā dhammā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātavaseneti ekadhāva nāmaṃ rūpassa paccayo hoti.
tika-abh07t:722_1: Cha vatthūni pavattiyaṃ sattannaṃ viññāṇadhātūnaṃ pañcārammaṇāni ca pañcaviññāṇavīthiyā purejātavaseneti ekadhāva rūpaṃ nāmassa paccayo hoti.
tika-abh07t:723_0: 20. Ārammaṇavasena upanissayavaseneti ca duvidhā paññattināmarūpāni nāmasseva paccayā honti.
tika-abh07t:725_0: 22. Upanissayo pana tividho hoti – ārammaṇūpanissayo anantarūpanissayo pakatūpanissayo ceti.
tika-abh07t:728_1: Rāgādayo pana dhammā saddhādayo ca sukhaṃ dukkhaṃ puggalo bhojanaṃ utusenāsanañca yathārahaṃ ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca kusalādidhammānaṃ,
tika-abh07t:728_2: kammaṃ vipākānanti ca bahudhā hoti pakatūpanissayo.
tika-abh07t:729_1: Adhipatisahajātaaññamaññanissayaāhāraindriyavippayuttaatthiavigatavaseneti yathārahaṃ navadhā nāmarūpāni nāmarūpānaṃ paccayā bhavanti.
tika-abh07t:730_2: sahajātādhipati catubbidhopi sahajātavasena sahajātānaṃ nāmarūpānanti ca duvidho hoti adhipatipaccayo.
tika-abh07t:731_3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuvipākā aññamaññanti ca tividho hoti sahajātapaccayo.
tika-abh07t:732_3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuvipākā aññamaññanti ca tividho hoti aññamaññapaccayo.
tika-abh07t:733_3: cha vatthūni sattannaṃ viññāṇadhātūnanti ca tividho hoti nissayapaccayo.
tika-abh07t:734_2: arūpino āhārā sahajātānaṃ nāmarūpānanti ca duvidho hoti āhārapaccayo.
tika-abh07t:735_3: arūpino indriyā sahajātānaṃ nāmarūpānanti ca tividho hoti indriyapaccayo.
tika-abh07t:736_3: pacchājātā cittacetasikā dhammā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātavasena cha vatthūni pavattiyaṃ sattannaṃ
tika-abh07t:736_4: viññāṇadhātūnaṃ purejātavaseneti ca tividho hoti vippayuttapaccayo.
tika-abh07t:740_0: 35. Ārammaṇūpanissayakammatthipaccayesu ca sabbepi paccayā samodhānaṃ gacchanti.
tika-abh07t:741_2: paṭisandhiyaṃ kaṭattārūpānañca vasena duvidhaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t:742_0: 37. Iti tekālikā dhammā, kālamuttā ca sambhavā.
tika-abh07t:746_3: nibbānañceti pañcavidhampi arūpanti ca nāmanti ca pavuccati.
tika-abh07t:748_0: 39. Tato avasesā paññatti pana paññāpiyattā paññatti, paññāpanato paññattīti ca duvidhā hoti.
tika-abh07t:749_6: taṃtaṃbhūtanimittaṃ bhāvanāvisesañca upādāya kasiṇanimittādikā ceti evamādippabhedā pana paramatthato
tika-abh07t:749_7: avijjamānāpi atthacchāyākārena cittuppādānamārammaṇabhūtā taṃ taṃ upādāya upanidhāya kāraṇaṃ katvā tathā
tika-abh07t:749_8: tathā parikappiyamānā saṅkhāyati samaññāyati voharīyati paññāpīyatīti paññattīti pavuccati.
tika-abh07t:751_1: Tattha yadā pana paramatthato vijjamānaṃ rūpavedanādiṃ etāya paññāpenti,
tika-abh07t:751_3: Yadā pana paramatthato avijjamānaṃ bhūmipabbatādiṃ etāya paññāpenti,
tika-abh07t:751_5: Ubhinnaṃ pana vomissakavasena sesā yathākkamaṃ chaḷabhiñño,
tika-abh07t:764_1: Rāgacaritā dosacaritā mohacaritā saddhācaritā buddhicaritā vitakkacaritā ceti chabbidhena caritasaṅgaho.
tika-abh07t:766_0: 4. Parikammabhāvanā upacārabhāvanā appanābhāvanā ceti tisso bhāvanā.
tika-abh07t:768_0: 5. Parikammanimittaṃ uggahanimittaṃ paṭibhāganimittañceti tīṇi nimittāni ca veditabbāni.
tika-abh07t:769_1: Pathavīkasiṇaṃ āpokasiṇaṃ tejokasiṇaṃ vāyokasiṇaṃ nīlakasiṇaṃ pītakasiṇaṃ lohitakasiṇaṃ odātakasiṇaṃ
tika-abh07t:769_2: ākāsakasiṇaṃ ālokakasiṇañceti imāni dasa kasiṇāni nāma.
tika-abh07t:770_1: Uddhumātakaṃ vinīlakaṃ vipubbakaṃ vicchiddakaṃ vikkhāyitakaṃ vikkhittakaṃ hatavikkhittakaṃ lohitakaṃ puḷavakaṃ aṭṭhikañceti ime dasa asubhā nāma.
tika-abh07t:771_1: Buddhānussati dhammānussati saṃghānussati sīlānussati cāgānussati devatānussati upasamānussati maraṇānussati
tika-abh07t:771_2: kāyagatāsati ānāpānassati ceti imā dasa anussatiyo nāma.
tika-abh07t:772_0: 9. Mettā karuṇā muditā upekkhā ceti imā catasso appamaññāyo nāma, brahmavihāroti ca pavuccati.
tika-abh07t:775_1: Ākāsānañcāyatanādayo cattāro āruppā nāmāti sabbathāpi samathaniddese cattālīsa kammaṭṭhānāni bhavanti.
tika-abh07t:777_0: 13. Caritāsu pana dasa asubhā kāyagatāsatisaṅkhātā koṭṭhāsabhāvanā ca rāgacaritassa sappāyā.
tika-abh07t:778_0: 14. Catasso appamaññāyo nīlādīni ca cattāri kasiṇāni dosacaritassa.
tika-abh07t:782_1: Sesāni pana sabbānipi kammaṭṭhānāni sabbesampi sappāyāni,
tika-abh07t:785_2: buddhānussatiādīsu aṭṭhasu saññāvavatthānesu cāti dasasukammaṭṭhānesu upacārabhāvanāva sampajjati,
tika-abh07t:794_0: 26. Nimittesu pana parikammanimittaṃ uggahanimittañca sabbatthāpi yathārahaṃ pariyāyena labbhanteva.
tika-abh07t:795_2: tattha hi paṭibhāganimittamārabbha upacārasamādhi appanāsamādhi ca pavattanti.
tika-abh07t:796_1: Ādikammikassa hi pathavīmaṇḍalādīsu nimittaṃ uggaṇhantassa tamārammaṇaṃ parikammanimittanti pavuccati,
tika-abh07t:797_1: Yadā pana taṃ nimittaṃ cittena samuggahitaṃ hoti,
tika-abh07t:798_1: Tathā samāhitassa panetassa tato paraṃ tasmiṃ uggahanimitte parikammasamādhinā bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa
tika-abh07t:798_2: yadā tappaṭibhāgaṃ vatthudhammavimuccitaṃ paññattisaṅkhātaṃ bhāvanāmayamārammaṇaṃ citte sannisannaṃ samappitaṃ hoti,
tika-abh07t:799_0: 31. Tato paṭṭhāya paripanthavippahīnā kāmāvacarasamādhisaṅkhātā upacārabhāvanā nipphannā nāma hoti.
tika-abh07t:800_1: Tato paraṃ tameva paribhāganimittaṃ upacārasamādhinā samāsevantassa rūpāvacarapaṭhamajjhānamappeti.
tika-abh07t:801_1: Tato paraṃ tameva paṭhamajjhānaṃ āvajjanaṃ samāpajjanaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ paccavekkhaṇā ceti imāhi
tika-abh07t:801_2: pañcahi vasitāhi vasībhūtaṃ katvā vitakkādikamoḷārikaṅgaṃ pahānāya vicārādisukhumaṅgupattiyā padahato
tika-abh07t:804_1: Ākāsavajjitakasiṇesu pana yaṃ kiñci kasiṇaṃ ugghāṭetvā laddhamākāsaṃ anantavasena parikammaṃ karontassa paṭhamāruppamappeti.
tika-abh07t:805_0: 37. Tameva paṭhamāruppaviññāṇaṃ anantavasena parikammaṃ karontassa dutiyāruppamappeti.
tika-abh07t:806_0: 38. Tameva paṭhamāruppaviññāṇābhāvaṃ pana “natthi kiñcī”ti parikammaṃ karontassa tatiyāruppamappeti.
tika-abh07t:808_1: Avasesesu ca dasasu kammaṭṭhānesu buddhaguṇādikamārammaṇamārabbha parikammaṃ katvā tasmiṃ nimitte sādhukamuggahite tattheva parikammañca samādhiyati,
tika-abh07t:809_1: Abhiññāvasena pavattamānaṃ pana rūpāvacarapañcamajjhānaṃ abhiññāpādakapañcamajjhānā vuṭṭhahitvā adhiṭṭheyyādikamāvajjetvā
tika-abh07t:817_1: Vipassanākammaṭṭhāne pana sīlavisuddhi cittavisuddhi diṭṭhivisuddhi kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhi maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhi
tika-abh07t:819_0: 45. Aniccānupassanā dukkhānupassanā anattānupassanā ceti tisso anupassanā.
tika-abh07t:820_1: Sammasanañāṇaṃ udayabbayañāṇaṃ bhaṅgañāṇaṃ bhayañāṇaṃ ādīnavañāṇaṃ nibbidāñāṇaṃ muccitukamyatāñāṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhāñāṇaṃ
tika-abh07t:821_0: 47. Suññato vimokkho, animitto vimokkho, appaṇihito vimokkho ceti tayo vimokkhā.
tika-abh07t:822_0: 48. Suññatānupassanā animittānupassanā appaṇihitānupassānā ceti tīṇi vimokkhamukhāni ca veditabbāni.
tika-abh07t:823_1: Pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ indriyasaṃvarasīlaṃ ājīvapārisuddhisīlaṃ paccayasannissitasīlañceti catupārisuddhisīlaṃ sīlavisuddhi nāma.
tika-abh07t:824_0: 50. Upacārasamādhi appanāsamādhi ceti duvidhopi samādhi cittavisuddhi nāma.
tika-abh07t:826_0: 52. Tesameva ca nāmarūpānaṃ paccayapariggaho kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhi nāma.
tika-abh07t:827_1: Tato paraṃ pana tathāpariggahitesu sappaccayesu tebhūmakasaṅkhāresu atītādibhedabhinnesu khandhādinayamārabbha
tika-abh07t:827_4: anattā asārakaṭṭhenā”ti addhānavasena santativasena khaṇavasena vā sammasanañāṇena lakkhaṇattayaṃ sammasantassa
tika-abh07t:827_5: tesveva paccayavasena khaṇavasena ca udayabbayañāṇena udayabbayaṃ samanupassantassa ca –
tika-abh07t:831_1: Tathā paripanthavimuttassa pana tassa udayabbayañāṇato paṭṭhāya yā vānulomā tilakkhaṇaṃ vipassanāparamparāya
tika-abh07t:832_1: Tassevaṃ paṭipajjantassa pana vipassanāparipākamāgamma “idāni appanā uppajjissatī”ti bhavaṅgaṃ vocchijjitvā
tika-abh07t:832_2: uppannamanodvārāvajjanānantaraṃ dve tīṇi vipassanācittāni yaṃ kiñci aniccādilakkhaṇamārabbha parikammopacārānulomanāmena
tika-abh07t:833_0: 56. Yā sikhāppattā, sā sānulomā saṅkhārupekkhā vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāti ca pavuccati.
tika-abh07t:835_1: Tassānantarameva maggo dukkhasaccaṃ parijānanto samudayasaccaṃ pajahanto,
tika-abh07t:836_1: Tato paraṃ dve tīṇi phalacittāni pavattitvā bhavaṅgapātova hoti,
tika-abh07t:838_0: Hīne kilese sese ca, paccavekkhati vāna vā.
tika-abh07t:843_0: 61. Tattha anattānupassanā attābhinivesaṃ muñcantī suññatānupassanā nāma vimokkhamukhaṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t:846_0: 64. Tasmā yadi vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā anattato vipassati, suññato vimokkho nāma hoti maggo.
tika-abh07t:847_0: 65. Yadi aniccato vipassati, animitto vimokkho nāma.
tika-abh07t:848_2: appaṇihito vimokkho nāmāti ca maggo vipassanāgamanavasena tīṇi nāmāni labhati,
tika-abh07t:849_1: Phalasamāpattivīthiyaṃ pana yathāvuttanayena vipassantānaṃ yathāsakaphalamuppajjamānampi vipassanāgamanavaseneva suññatādivimokkhoti ca pavuccati,
tika-abh07t:849_2: ārammaṇavasena pana sarasavasena ca nāmattayaṃ sabbattha sabbesampi samameva ca.
tika-abh07t:852_1: Ettha pana sotāpattimaggaṃ bhāvetvā diṭṭhivicikicchāpahānena pahīnāpāyagamano sattakkhattuparamo sotāpanno nāma hoti.
tika-abh07t:853_1: Sakadāgāmimaggaṃ bhāvetvā rāgadosamohānaṃ tanukarattā sakadāgāmī nāma hoti sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā.
tika-abh07t:854_1: Anāgāmimaggaṃ bhāvetvā kāmarāgabyāpādānamanavasesappahānena anāgāmī nāma hoti anāgantvā itthattaṃ.
tika-abh07t:855_1: Arahattamaggaṃ bhāvetvā anavasesakilesappahānena arahā nāma hoti khīṇāsavo loke aggadakkhiṇeyyoti.
tika-abh07t:859_2: tattha yathākkamaṃ paṭhamajjhānādimahaggatasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tattha gate saṅkhāradhamme
tika-abh07t:859_3: tattha tattheva vipassanto yāva ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ gantvā tato paraṃ adhiṭṭheyyādikaṃ pubbakiccaṃ katvā
tika-abh07t:859_5: tassa dvinnaṃ appanājavanānaṃ parato vocchijjati cittasantati,
tika-abh07t:860_2: arahato arahattaphalacittaṃ ekavārameva pavattitvā bhavaṅgapāto hoti,
tika-abh07t:888_0: (Gha) porāṇehi anekāpi, katā yā pana vaṇṇanā;
tika-abh07t:889_0: Na tāhi sakkā sabbattha, attho viññātave idha.
tika-abh07t:894_2: abhidhammatthasaṅgaha”nti etena abhidheyyakaraṇappakārapakaraṇābhidhānāni abhidhammatthānaṃ idha saṅgahetabbabhāvadassanena
tika-abh07t:894_6: Payojanaṃ pana saṅgahapadena sāmatthiyato dassitameva abhidhammatthānaṃ ekattha saṅgahe sati taduggahaparipucchādivasena tesaṃ sarūpāvabodhassa,
tika-abh07t:895_0: Tattha ratanattayapaṇāmappayojanaṃ tāva bahudhā papañcenti ācariyā,
tika-abh07t:895_4: sā ca vandaneyyavandakānaṃ khettajjhāsayasampadāhi diṭṭhadhammavedanīyabhūtā yathāladdhasampattinimittakassa
tika-abh07t:895_7: Tasmā pakaraṇārambhe ratanattayapaṇāmakaraṇaṃ yathāraddhapakaraṇassa anantarāyena parisamāpanatthañceva
tika-abh07t:895_9: Abhidheyyakathanaṃ pana viditābhidheyyasseva ganthassa viññūhi uggahaṇādivasena paṭipajjitabbabhāvato.
tika-abh07t:895_13: sasaddhammagaṇuttamaṃ atulaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ abhivādiya abhidhammatthasaṅgahaṃ bhāsissanti sambandho.
tika-abh07t:896_0: Tattha sammā sāmañca sabbadhamme abhisambuddhoti sammā sambuddho, bhagavā.
tika-abh07t:896_1: So hi saṅkhatāsaṅkhatabhedaṃ sakalampi dhammajātaṃ yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇapaṭivedhavasena sammā sayaṃ vicitopacitapāramitāsambhūtena
tika-abh07t:896_4: atha vā budhadhātussa jāgaraṇavikasanatthesupi pavattanato sammā sāmañca paṭibuddho anaññapaṭibodhito
tika-abh07t:896_8: Yathāvuttavacanatthayogepi sammāsambuddhasaddassa bhagavati samaññāvasena pavattattā “atula”nti iminā viseseti.
tika-abh07t:896_11: Atha vā sammitatthe akārapaccayavasena tulāya sammito tulo,
tika-abh07t:896_14: natthi etassa vā tulo sadisoti atulo sadevake loke aggapuggalabhāvato.
tika-abh07t:896_17: sattā apadā vā dvipadā vā catuppadā vā…pe…
tika-abh07t:897_0: Ettāvatā ca hetuphalasattūpakārasampadāvasena tīhākārehi bhagavato thomanā katā hoti.
tika-abh07t:897_7: Sakalalokanayanābhisekabhūtā pana lakkhaṇānubyañjanappaṭimaṇḍitā attabhāvasampatti rūpakāyasampadā nāma.
tika-abh07t:897_11: Tadaññasattānaṃ pana lābhasakkārādinirapekkhacittassa yānattayamukhena sabbadukkhaniyyānikadhammadesanā payogo nāma.
tika-abh07t:898_0: Tattha purimā dve phalasampadā “sammāsambuddha”nti iminā dassitā,
tika-abh07t:898_3: tadupāyabhūtā pana hetusampadā dvīhipi sāmatthiyato dassitā tathāvidhahetubyatirekena tadubhayasampattīnamasambhavato,
tika-abh07t:899_0: Tadevaṃ tividhāvatthāsaṅgahitathomanāpubbaṅgamaṃ buddharatanaṃ vanditvā idāni sesaratanānampi paṇāmamārabhanto āha “sasaddhammagaṇuttama”nti.
tika-abh07t:899_1: Guṇībhūtānampi hi dhammasaṃghānaṃ abhivādetabbabhāvo sahayogena viññāyati yathā “saputtadāro āgatoti puttadārassāpi āgamana”nti.
tika-abh07t:900_1: vaṭṭadukkhesu ca apatamāne katvā dhāretīti dhammo,
tika-abh07t:900_6: nibbānassa ca ārammaṇabhāvena tassa tadatthasiddhihetutāya nippariyāyato labbhati,
tika-abh07t:900_8: pariyattiyā ca tadadhigamahetutāyāti ubhinnampi pariyāyatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t:900_10: santo vā saṃvijjamāno na titthiyaparikappito attā viya paramatthato avijjamāno santo vā pasattho svākkhātatādiguṇayogato
tika-abh07t:900_11: na bāhirakadhammo viya ekantanindito dhammoti saddhammo,
tika-abh07t:900_12: gaṇo ca so aṭṭhannaṃ ariyapuggalānaṃ samūhabhāvato uttamo ca suppaṭipannatādiguṇavisesayogato, gaṇānaṃ,
tika-abh07t:900_13: gaṇesu vā devamanussādi samūhesu uttamo yathāvuttaguṇavasenāti gaṇuttamo,
tika-abh07t:901_3: Nibbattitaparamatthabhāvena abhi visiṭṭhā dhammā etthātiādinā abhidhammo,
tika-abh07t:903_1: Evaṃ tāva yathādhippetappayojananimittaṃ ratanattayapaṇāmādikaṃ vidhāya idāni yesaṃ abhidhammatthānaṃ saṅgahaṇavasena idaṃ pakaraṇaṃ paṭṭhapīyati,
tika-abh07t:903_2: te tāva saṅkhepato uddisanto āha “tattha vuttā”tyādi.
tika-abh07t:903_4: khandhādivasena ca vuttā abhidhammatthā paramatthato sammutiṃ ṭhapetvā nibbattitaparamatthavasena cittaṃ viññāṇakkhandho,
tika-abh07t:903_7: nibbānaṃ maggaphalānamārammaṇabhūto asaṅkhatadhammoti evaṃ catudhā catūhākārehi ṭhitāti yojanā.
tika-abh07t:903_9: paramassa vā uttamassa ñāṇassa attho gocaroti paramattho.
tika-abh07t:904_3: Satipi hi nissayasamanantarādipaccayena vinā ārammaṇena cittamuppajjatīti tassa taṃlakkhaṇatā vuttā,
tika-abh07t:904_5: Cintenti vā etena karaṇabhūtena sampayuttadhammāti cittaṃ.
tika-abh07t:904_7: Yathāpaccayaṃ hi pavattimattameva yadidaṃ sabhāvadhammo nāma.
tika-abh07t:904_8: Evañca katvā sabbesampi paramatthadhammānaṃ bhāvasādhanameva nippariyāyato labbhati,
tika-abh07t:904_10: Sakasakakiccesu hi dhammānaṃ attappadhānatāsamāropanena kattubhāvo ca,
tika-abh07t:904_11: tadanukūlabhāvena sahajātadhammasamūhe kattubhāvasamāropanena paṭipādetabbadhammassa karaṇattañca pariyāyatova labbhati,
tika-abh07t:904_12: tathānidassanaṃ pana dhammasabhāvavinimuttassa kattādino abhāvaparidīpanatthanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t:906_0: Citaṃ kammakilesehi, citaṃ tāyati vā tathā;
tika-abh07t:908_1: Na hi taṃ cittena vinā ārammaṇaggahaṇasamatthaṃ asati citte sabbena sabbaṃ anuppajjanato,
tika-abh07t:908_2: cittaṃ pana kenaci cetasikena vināpi ārammaṇe pavattatīti taṃ cetasikameva cittāyattavuttikaṃ nāma.
tika-abh07t:908_4: etena sukhādīnaṃ acetanattaniccattādayo vippaṭipattiyopi paṭikkhittā honti.
tika-abh07t:909_8: Itarathā hi “ruppatī”ti avisesavacaneneva pariyattanti kiṃ sītādiggahaṇena,
tika-abh07t:909_9: taṃ pana sītādinā phuṭṭhassa ruppanaṃ vibhūtataraṃ,
tika-abh07t:909_12: na hi tattha upaghātakā sītādayo atthīti?
tika-abh07t:909_16: atha vā taṃsabhāvānativattanato tattha rūpavohāroti alamatippapañcena.
tika-abh07t:910_0: Bhavābhavaṃ vinanato saṃsibbanato vānasaṅkhātāya taṇhāya nikkhantaṃ,
tika-abh07t:913_1: Idāni yasmā vibhāgavantānaṃ dhammānaṃ sabhāvavibhāvanaṃ vibhāgena vinā na hoti,
tika-abh07t:913_2: tasmā yathāuddiṭṭhānaṃ abhidhammatthānaṃ uddesakkamena vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ cittaṃ tāva bhūmijātisampayogādivasena
tika-abh07t:913_3: vibhajitvā niddisitumārabhanto āha “tattha cittaṃ tāvā”tyādi. Tāva-
tika-abh07t:913_5: Yathāuddiṭṭhesu catūsu abhidhammatthesu paṭhamaṃ cittaṃ niddisīyatīti ayañhetthattho.
tika-abh07t:913_15: Yebhuyyena caraṇassa hi adhippetattā rūpārūpabhavesu pavattassāpi imassa kāmāvacarabhāvo upapanno hoti.
tika-abh07t:913_16: Kāmabhavoyeva vā kāmo ettha avacaratīti kāmāvacaro,
tika-abh07t:913_17: tattha pavattampi cittaṃ nissite nissayavohārena kāmāvacaraṃ “mañcā ukkuṭṭhiṃ karontī”tyādīsu viyāti alamativisāraṇiyā kathāya.
tika-abh07t:916_4: Ubhayampi vā saha nibbānena lokato uttaraṃ adhikaṃ yathāvuttaguṇavasenevāti lokuttaraṃ.
tika-abh07t:919_1: Imesu pana catūsu cittesu kāmāvacaracittassa kusalākusalavipākakiriyabhedena catubbidhabhāvepi pāpāhetukavajjānaṃ ekūnasaṭṭhiyā,
tika-abh07t:919_2: ekanavutiyā vā cittānaṃ sobhananāmena vohārakaraṇatthaṃ “pāpāhetukamuttāni ‘sobhanānī’ti vuccare”ti evaṃ
tika-abh07t:919_4: tesu ca bhavesu gahitapaṭisandhikassa sattassa ādito vīthicittavasena lobhasahagatacittuppādānameva sambhavato
tika-abh07t:919_5: teyeva paṭhamaṃ dassetvā tadanantaraṃ dvihetukabhāvasāmaññena domanassasahagate,
tika-abh07t:919_6: tadanantaraṃ ekahetuke ca dassetuṃ “somanassasahagata”ntyādinā lobhamūlaṃ tāva vedanādiṭṭhisaṅkhārabhedena aṭṭhadhā vibhajitvā dasseti.
tika-abh07t:920_1: taṃ vā etassa atthīti sumano, cittaṃ,
tika-abh07t:920_3: tassa bhāvo tasmiṃ abhidhānabuddhīnaṃ pavattihetutāyāti somanassaṃ,
tika-abh07t:920_6: tena saha ekuppādādibhāvaṃ gatanti vā somanassasahagataṃ.
tika-abh07t:920_8: Sāmaññavacanassapi hi atthappakaraṇādinā visesavisayatā hotīti idha micchādassanameva “diṭṭhī”ti vuccati.
tika-abh07t:920_12: diṭṭhiyā vā gamanamattaṃ na ettha gantabbo attādiko koci atthīti diṭṭhigataṃ,
tika-abh07t:920_14: tena samaṃ ekuppādādīhi pakārehi yuttanti diṭṭhigatasampayuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t:920_16: saṅkharīyati vā taṃ etena yathāvuttanayena sajjīyatīti saṅkhāro,
tika-abh07t:920_17: tattha tattha kicce saṃsīdamānassa cittassa anubalappadānavasena attano vā paresaṃ vā pavattapubbappayogo,
tika-abh07t:920_18: so pana attano pubbabhāgappavatte cittasantāne ceva parasantāne ca pavattatīti tannibbattito cittassa tikkhabhāvasaṅkhāto visesovidha saṅkhāro,
tika-abh07t:923_0: Atha vā “sasaṅkhārikaṃ asaṅkhārika”nti cetaṃ kevalaṃ saṅkhārassa bhāvābhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-abh07t:923_1: na tassa sahappavattisabbhāvābhāvatoti bhinnasantānappavattinopi saṅkhārassa idamatthitāya taṃvasena
tika-abh07t:923_2: nibbattaṃ cittaṃ saṅkhāro assa atthīti sasaṅkhārikaṃ “salomako sapakkhako”tyādīsu viya saha-
tika-abh07t:923_6: Upapattito yuttito ikkhati anubhavati vedayamānāpi majjhattākārasaṇṭhitiyāti upekkhā.
tika-abh07t:923_7: Sukhadukkhānaṃ vā upetā yuttā aviruddhā ikkhā anubhavananti upekkhā.
tika-abh07t:924_0: Kasmā panettha aññesupi phassādīsu sampayuttadhammesu vijjamānesu somanassasahagatādibhāvova vuttoti?
tika-abh07t:924_4: mohādayo ca sabbākusalasādhāraṇāti na tehi sakkā cittaṃ visesetuṃ,
tika-abh07t:924_6: katthaci na hontīti pākaṭova taṃvasena cittassa viseso.
tika-abh07t:924_21: Tasmā attano anurūpakāraṇavasena nesaṃ uppajjanato katthaci citteyeva sambhavoti sakkā etehi cittassa viseso paññāpetunti.
tika-abh07t:924_22: Evañca katvā nesaṃ satipi mohahetukabhāve lobhasahagatabhāvova nigamane vutto.
tika-abh07t:925_1: Yadā hi “natthi kāmesu ādīnavo”tyādinā nayena micchādiṭṭhiṃ purakkhatvā haṭṭhatuṭṭho kāme vā paribhuñjati,
tika-abh07t:925_2: diṭṭhamaṅgalādīni vā sārato pacceti sabhāvatikkheneva anussāhitena cittena,
tika-abh07t:925_6: Yadā pana micchādiṭṭhiṃ apurakkhatvā kevalaṃ haṭṭhatuṭṭho methunaṃ vā sevati,
tika-abh07t:925_8: parabhaṇḍaṃ vā harati sabhāvatikkheneva anussāhitena cittena,
tika-abh07t:925_12: Yadā pana kāmānaṃ vā asampattiṃ āgamma,
tika-abh07t:925_13: aññesaṃ vā somanassahetūnaṃ abhāvena catūsupi vikappesu somanassarahitā honti,
tika-abh07t:925_17: tena vakkhamānanayena akusalakammapathesu nesaṃ labbhamānakammapathānurūpato pavattibhedaṃ kāladesasantānārammaṇādibhedena anekavidhatampi saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-abh07t:926_7: Caṇḍikkasabhāvatāya hesa ārammaṇaṃ paṭihananto viya pavattati.
tika-abh07t:926_8: Domanassasahagatassa vedanāvasena abhedepi asādhāraṇadhammavasena cittassa upalakkhaṇatthaṃ domanassaggahaṇaṃ,
tika-abh07t:926_9: paṭighasampayuttabhāvo pana ubhinnaṃ ekantasahacāritā dassanatthaṃ vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t:926_11: paṭigho caṇḍikkasabhāvo saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpanno eko dhammoti ayametesaṃ viseso.
tika-abh07t:926_15: Dvinnaṃ pana nesaṃ cittānaṃ pāṇātipātādīsu tikkhamandappavattikāle uppatti veditabbā.
tika-abh07t:927_1: Sabhāvaṃ vicinanto tāya kicchati kilamatīti vicikicchā.
tika-abh07t:927_2: Atha vā cikicchituṃ dukkaratāya vigatā cikicchā ñāṇappaṭikāro imissāti vicikicchā,
tika-abh07t:927_5: Uddhaccassa sabbākusalasādhāraṇabhāvepi idha sampayuttadhammesu padhānaṃ hutvā pavattatīti idameva tena visesetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t:927_6: Evañca katvā dhammuddesapāḷiyaṃ sesākusalesu uddhaccaṃ yevāpanakavasena vuttaṃ,
tika-abh07t:931_0: Vatvā sesesu ettheva, taṃ sarūpena desita”nti.
tika-abh07t:932_0: Imāni pana dve cittāni mūlantaravirahato atisammūḷhatāya,
tika-abh07t:932_1: saṃsappanavikkhipanavasena pavattavicikicchuddhaccasamāyogena cañcalatāya ca sabbatthāpi rajjanadussanarahitāni upekkhāsahagatāneva pavattanti,
tika-abh07t:932_2: tatoyeva ca sabhāvatikkhatāya ussāhetabbatāya abhāvato saṅkhārabhedopi nesaṃ natthi.
tika-abh07t:934_0: Sopekkhaṃ sabbadā no ca, bhinnaṃ saṅkhārabhedato.
tika-abh07t:937_0: Mohena muyhanti atisayena muyhanti mūlantaravirahatoti momūhāni.
tika-abh07t:938_6: Iccevaṃ yathāvuttanayena sabbathāpi somanassupekkhādiṭṭhisampayogādinā paṭighasampayogādinā vicikicchuddhaccayogenāti
tika-abh07t:938_7: sabbenāpi sampayogādiākārena dvādasa akusalacittāni samattāni pariniṭṭhitāni,
tika-abh07t:938_10: Tattha kusalapaṭipakkhāni akusalāni mittappaṭipakkho amitto viya,
tika-abh07t:938_11: paṭipakkhabhāvo ca kusalākusalānaṃ yathākkamaṃ pahāyakapahātabbabhāvena veditabbo.
tika-abh07t:939_2: Lobho ca so suppatiṭṭhitabhāvasādhanena mūlasadisattā mūlañca,
tika-abh07t:939_3: kaṃ etesanti lobhamūlāni cittāni vedanādibhedato aṭṭhadhā siyuṃ.
tika-abh07t:939_5: Mohamūlāni suddho mohoyeva mūlametesanti mohamūlasaṅkhātāni sampayogabhedato dve cāti akusalā dvādasa siyuntyattho.
tika-abh07t:942_1: Evaṃ mūlabhedato tividhampi akusalaṃ sampayogādibhedato dvādasadhā vibhajitvā idāni ahetukacittāni niddisanto
tika-abh07t:942_4: Tattha cakkhati viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṃ hutvā samavisamaṃ ācikkhantaṃ viya hotīti cakkhu.
tika-abh07t:942_5: Atha vā cakkhati rūpaṃ assādentaṃ viya hotīti cakkhu.
tika-abh07t:942_14: saddārāmaṃ saddarataṃ saddasammudita”ntyādivacanato sotādīnampi saddādiassādanaṃ atthīti tesampi cakkhusaddābhidheyyatā āpajjeyyāti?
tika-abh07t:942_18: cakkhunā sahavuttiyā pana bhamukaṭṭhiparicchinno maṃsapiṇḍopi “cakkhū”ti vuccati.
tika-abh07t:942_20: saddassa vibhāvanatthatāpi sambhavatīti “cakkhati rūpaṃ vibhāvetīti cakkhū”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t:943_5: taṃ avhāyati tasmiṃ ninnatāyāti jivhā niruttinayena.
tika-abh07t:943_8: tammūlakānañca pāpadhammānaṃ visesakāraṇanti tesaṃ pavattiṭṭhānaṃ viya gayhati.
tika-abh07t:943_9: Sasambhārakāyo vā kucchitānaṃ kesādīnaṃ āyoti kāyo.
tika-abh07t:943_15: Sammā tīreti yathāsampaṭicchitaṃ rūpādiārammaṇaṃ vīmaṃsatīti santīraṇaṃ.
tika-abh07t:943_18: Evañca katvā kusalākusalakammasamuṭṭhānānampi kaṭattārūpānaṃ natthi vipākavohāro.
tika-abh07t:944_5: Kasmā pana yathā akusalavipākasantīraṇaṃ ekameva vuttaṃ,
tika-abh07t:944_8: Yadi evaṃ tatthāpi aniṭṭhaaniṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇavasena vedanābhedena bhavitabbanti?
tika-abh07t:944_9: Nayidamevaṃ aniṭṭhārammaṇe uppajjitabbassapi domanassassa paṭighena vinā anuppajjanato,
tika-abh07t:944_11: Na hi bhinnajātiko dhammo bhinnajātikesu upalabbhati,
tika-abh07t:944_12: tasmā attanā samānayogakkhamassa asambhavato akusalavipākesu domanassaṃ na sambhavatīti tassa taṃsahagatatā na vuttā.
tika-abh07t:944_13: Atha vā yathā koci balavatā pothiyamāno dubbalapuriso tassa paṭippaharituṃ asakkonto tasmiṃ upekkhakova hoti,
tika-abh07t:944_14: evameva akusalavipākānaṃ paridubbalabhāvato aniṭṭhārammaṇepi domanassuppādo natthīti santīraṇaṃ upekkhāsahagatameva.
tika-abh07t:945_0: Cakkhuviññāṇādīni pana cattāri ubhayavipākānipi vatthārammaṇaghaṭṭanāya dubbalabhāvato aniṭṭhe iṭṭhepi ca ārammaṇe upekkhāsahagatāneva.
tika-abh07t:945_3: upādārūpakena ca upādārūpakassa saṅghaṭṭanaṃ atidubbalaṃ picupiṇḍakena picupiṇḍakassa phusanaṃ viya,
tika-abh07t:945_5: Kāyaviññāṇassa pana phoṭṭhabbasaṅkhātabhūtattayameva ārammaṇanti taṃ kāyappasāde saṅghaṭṭitampi taṃ atikkamitvā tannissayesu mahābhūtesu paṭihaññati.
tika-abh07t:945_6: Bhūtarūpehi ca bhūtarūpānaṃ saṅghaṭṭanaṃ balavataraṃ adhikaraṇimatthake picupiṇḍakaṃ ṭhapetvā kūṭena
tika-abh07t:945_7: pahaṭakāle kūṭassa picupiṇḍakaṃ atikkamitvā adhikaraṇiggahaṇaṃ viya,
tika-abh07t:945_8: tasmā vatthārammaṇaghaṭṭanāya balavabhāvato kāyaviññāṇaṃ aniṭṭhe dukkhasahagataṃ,
tika-abh07t:945_10: Sampaṭicchanayugaḷhaṃ pana attanā asamānanissayānaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnamanantaraṃ uppajjatīti samānanissayato
tika-abh07t:945_11: aladdhānantarapaccayatāya sabhāgūpatthambharahito viya puriso nātibalavaṃ sabbathāpi visayarasamanubhavituṃ
tika-abh07t:945_14: Yadi evaṃ āvajjanadvayassa upekkhāsampayogaṃ kasmā vakkhati,
tika-abh07t:945_16: tattha pana purimaṃ pubbe kenaci aggahiteyeva ārammaṇe ekavārameva pavattati,
tika-abh07t:945_17: pacchimampi visadisacittasantānaparāvattanavasena byāpārantarasāpekkhanti na sabbathāpi visayarasamanubhavituṃ sakkoti,
tika-abh07t:952_2: Nibbattakahetuvasena nipphannānipi hetāni sampayuttahetuvaseneva ahetukavohāraṃ labhanti,
tika-abh07t:952_4: Kiṃ panettha kāraṇaṃ yathā idhevaṃ akusalavipākanigamane ahetukaggahaṇaṃ na katanti?
tika-abh07t:952_10: sayaṃ abyākataniravajjasabhāvānaṃ lobhādiakusaladhammasampayogavirodhato ca natthi kadācipi sahetukatāya
tika-abh07t:952_11: sambhavoti ahetukabhāvābyabhicārato na tāni ahetukasaddena visesitabbāni.
tika-abh07t:953_1: Idāni ahetukādhikāre ahetukakiriyacittānipi kiccabhedena tidhā dassetuṃ “upekkhāsahagata”ntyādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t:953_2: Cakkhādipañcadvāre ghaṭṭitamārammaṇaṃ āvajjeti tattha ābhogaṃ karoti,
tika-abh07t:953_3: cittasantānaṃ vā bhavaṅgavasena pavattituṃ adatvā vīthicittabhāvāya pariṇāmetīti pañcadvārāvajjanaṃ,
tika-abh07t:953_5: Āvajjanassa anantarapaccayabhūtaṃ bhavaṅgacittaṃ manodvāraṃ vīthicittānaṃ pavattimukhabhāvato.
tika-abh07t:953_9: Idameva ca pañcadvāre yathāsantīritaṃ ārammaṇaṃ vavatthapetīti voṭṭhabbananti ca vuccati.
tika-abh07t:957_1: Evaṃ dvādasākusalaahetukāṭṭhārasavasena samatiṃsa cittāni dassetvā idāni tabbinimuttānaṃ sobhanavohāraṃ ṭhapetuṃ “pāpāhetukamuttānī”tyādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t:957_4: atha vā aṭṭha lokuttarāni jhānaṅgayogabhedena paccekaṃ pañcadhā katvā ekanavutipi cittāni sobhanaguṇāvahanato,
tika-abh07t:959_1: Idāni sobhanesu kāmāvacarānameva paṭhamaṃ uddiṭṭhattā tesupi abyākatānaṃ kusalapubbakattā paṭhamaṃ kāmāvacarakusalaṃ,
tika-abh07t:959_3: tadanantaraṃ tadekabhūmipariyāpannaṃ kiriyacittañca paccekaṃ vedanāñāṇasaṅkhārabhedena aṭṭhadhā dassetuṃ “somanassasahagata”ntyādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t:959_6: Ettha ca balavasaddhāya dassanasampattiyā paccayapaṭiggāhakādisampattiyāti evamādīhi kāraṇehi somanassasahagatatā,
tika-abh07t:960_1: aññaṃ vā somanassahetuṃ āgamma haṭṭhapahaṭṭho “atthi dinna”ntyādinayappavattaṃ sammādiṭṭhiṃ purakkhatvā
tika-abh07t:960_2: muttacāgatādivasena asaṃsīdanto anussāhito parehi dānādīni puññāni karoti,
tika-abh07t:960_3: tadāssa cittaṃ somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ asaṅkhārikaṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t:960_4: Yadā pana vuttanayeneva haṭṭhatuṭṭho sammādiṭṭhiṃ purakkhatvāpi amuttacāgatādivasena saṃsīdamāno parehi vā ussāhito karoti,
tika-abh07t:960_6: Yadā pana ñātijanassa paṭipattidassanena jātaparicayā bāladārakā bhikkhū disvā somanassajātā sahasā kiñcideva hatthagataṃ dadanti vā vandanti vā,
tika-abh07t:960_12: aññesaṃ vā somanassahetūnaṃ abhāvaṃ āgamma catūsupi vikappesu somanassarahitā honti,
tika-abh07t:963_0: Imāni hi aṭṭha cittāni dasapuññakiriyavatthuvasena pavattanato paccekaṃ dasa dasāti katvā asīti cittāni honti,
tika-abh07t:963_1: tāni ca chasu ārammaṇesu pavattanato paccekaṃ chagguṇitāni sāsītikāni cattāri satāni honti,
tika-abh07t:963_3: tāni tiṇṇaṃ adhipatīnaṃ vasena tiguṇitāni vīsādhikāni sattasatāni,
tika-abh07t:963_4: tathā ñāṇasampayuttāni ca catunnaṃ adhipatīnaṃ vasena catugguṇitāni sasaṭṭhikāni nava satānīti evaṃ adhipativasena
tika-abh07t:963_5: sahassaṃ sāsītikāni ca cha satāni honti,
tika-abh07t:963_6: tāni kāyavacīmanokammasaṅkhātakammattikavasena tiguṇitāni cattālīsādhikāni pañca sahassāni honti,
tika-abh07t:963_7: tāni ca hīnamajjhimapaṇītabhedato tiguṇitāni vīsasatādhikapannarasasahassāni honti.
tika-abh07t:966_0: Taṃ adhipativasena gaṇanaparihāniṃ anādiyitvā sotapatitavasena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-abh07t:967_0: Kucchite pāpadhamme salayanti kampenti viddhaṃsenti apagamentīti vā kusalāni.
tika-abh07t:967_1: Atha vā kucchitākārena santāne sayanato pavattanato kusasaṅkhāte pāpadhamme lunanti chindantīti kusalāni.
tika-abh07t:967_2: Atha vā kucchite pāpadhamme sānato tanukaraṇato osānakaraṇato vā kusasaṅkhātena ñāṇena,
tika-abh07t:967_3: saddhādidhammajātena vā lātabbāni sahajātaupanissayabhāvena yathārahaṃ pavattetabbānīti kusalāni,
tika-abh07t:967_4: tāneva yathāvuttatthena kāmāvacarāni kusalacittāni cāti kāmāvacarakusalacittāni.
tika-abh07t:968_9: tasmā taṃvasena parihāpetvā yathārahaṃ gaṇanabhedo yojetabbo.
tika-abh07t:968_15: Yathāpayogaṃ vinā sappayogañca yathāupaṭṭhitehi kammādipaccayehi utubhojanādisappāyāsappāyavasena asaṅkhārikasasaṅkhārikāni.
tika-abh07t:969_0: 17. Kiriyacittānampi kusale vuttanayena yathārahaṃ somanassasahagatāditā veditabbā.
tika-abh07t:970_1: Sahetukakāmāvacarakusalavipākakiriyacittānīti ettha sahetukaggahaṇaṃ vipākakiriyāpekkhaṃ visesanaṃ kusalassa ekantasahetukattā.
tika-abh07t:970_3: “sakkharakathalampi macchagumbampi carantampi tiṭṭhantampī”tyādīsu viya sakkharakathalassa caraṇāyogato macchagumbāpekkhāya caraṇakiriyā yojīyatīti.
tika-abh07t:971_3: saṅkhārabhedato aṭṭhavidhattā ca sampiṇḍetvā catuvīsati matāti yojanā.
tika-abh07t:971_4: Nanu ca vedanābhedo tāva yutto tāsaṃ bhinnasabhāvattā.
tika-abh07t:971_6: Ñāṇasaṅkhārānaṃ bhāvābhāvakatopi bhedo ñāṇasaṅkhārakatova yathā vassakato subhikkho dubbhikkhoti,
tika-abh07t:971_7: tasmā ñāṇasaṅkhārakato bhedo ñāṇasaṅkhārabhedoti na ettha koci virodhoti.
tika-abh07t:972_1: Idāni sabbānipi kāmāvacaracittāni sampiṇḍetvā dassetuṃ “kāme tevīsā”tyādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t:972_3: sahetukāhetukāni soḷasa kusalavipākānīti evaṃ tevīsati vipākāni dvādasa akusalāni,
tika-abh07t:972_4: aṭṭha kusalānīti puññāpuññāni vīsati ahetukā tisso sahetukā aṭṭhāti ekādasa kiriyā cāti sabbathāpi kusalākusalavipākakiriyānaṃ
tika-abh07t:975_1: Idāni tadanantaruddiṭṭhassa rūpāvacarassa niddesakkamo anuppattoti tassa jhānaṅgayogabhedena pañcadhā vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “vitakka…pe…
tika-abh07t:975_3: Vitakko ca vicāro ca pīti ca sukhañca ekaggatā cāti imehi sahitaṃ vitakkavicārapītisukhekaggatāsahitaṃ.
tika-abh07t:975_4: Tattha ārammaṇaṃ vitakketi sampayuttadhamme abhiniropetīti vitakko,
tika-abh07t:975_6: yathā hi koci gāmavāsī puriso rājavallabhaṃ sambandhinaṃ mittaṃ vā nissāya rājagehaṃ anupavisati,
tika-abh07t:975_7: evaṃ vitakkaṃ nissāya cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārohati.
tika-abh07t:975_8: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ avitakkaṃ cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārohatīti?
tika-abh07t:975_10: Yathā hi so puriso paricayena tena vināpi nirāsaṅko rājagehaṃ pavisati,
tika-abh07t:975_11: evaṃ paricayena vitakkena vināpi avitakkaṃ cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ abhinirohati.
tika-abh07t:975_12: Paricayoti cettha savitakkacittassa santāne abhiṇhappavattivasena nibbattā cittabhāvanā.
tika-abh07t:976_4: tasseva pubbaṅgamaṭṭhena ca paṭhamaghaṇṭābhighāto viya cetaso paṭhamābhinipāto vitakko,
tika-abh07t:976_11: padumassa uparibhāge paribbhamanaṃ viya ca padumābhimukhapatitassa bhamarassa.
tika-abh07t:977_6: Tattha ārammaṇappaṭilābhe pītiyā viseso pākaṭo kantārakhinnassa vanantodakadassane viya,
tika-abh07t:977_7: yathāladdhassa anubhavane sukhassa viseso pākaṭo yathādiṭṭhaudakassa pānādīsu viyāti.
tika-abh07t:977_8: Nānārammaṇavikkhepābhāvena ekaṃ ārammaṇaṃ aggaṃ imassāti ekaggaṃ, cittaṃ,
tika-abh07t:977_11: Tassa hi vasena sasampayuttaṃ cittaṃ avikkhittaṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t:978_0: Paṭhamañca desanākkamato ceva uppattikkamato ca ādibhūtattā taṃ jhānañca ārammaṇūpanijjhānato,
tika-abh07t:978_3: Jhānaṅgasamudāye yeva hi jhānavohāro nemiādiaṅgasamudāye rathavohāro viya,
tika-abh07t:978_4: tathā hi vuttaṃ vibhaṅge “jhānanti vitakko vicāro pīti sukhaṃ cittassekaggatā”ti.
tika-abh07t:979_0: Kasmā pana aññesu phassādīsu sampayuttadhammesu vijjamānesu imeyeva pañca jhānaṅgavasena vuttāti? Vuccate –
tika-abh07t:979_7: atha naṃ sasampayuttadhammaṃ etehi abhiniropanānuppabandhanapīnanaupabrūhanehi anuggahitā ekaggatā samādhānakiccena
tika-abh07t:979_10: Indriyasamatāvasena samaṃ paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ dūrībhāvena līnuddhaccābhāvena sammā ca ṭhapetīti evamete sameva upanijjhānakiccaṃ āveṇikaṃ.
tika-abh07t:979_11: Kāmacchandādipaṭipakkhabhāve pana samādhi kāmacchandassa paṭipakkho rāgappaṇidhiyā ujupaccanīkabhāvato.
tika-abh07t:979_12: Kāmacchandavasena hi nānārammaṇehi palobhitassa paribbhamantassa cittassa samādhānaṃ ekaggatāya hoti.
tika-abh07t:979_14: Vitakko thinamiddhassa yoniso saṅkappanavasena savipphārappavattito sukhaṃ avūpasamānutāpasabhāvassa uddhaccakukkuccassa vūpasantasītalasabhāvattā.
tika-abh07t:979_17: kāmacchandādīnaṃ ujupaṭipakkhabhāvato ca imeyeva pañca jhānaṅgabhāvena vavatthitāti. Yathāhu –
tika-abh07t:982_0: Upekkhā panetta santavuttisabhāvattā sukheva antogadhāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenāhu –
tika-abh07t:984_0: Pahānaṅgādivasena panassa viseso upari āvi bhavissati,
tika-abh07t:984_2: Athettha kāmāvacarakusalesu viya saṅkhārabhedo kasmā na gahito.
tika-abh07t:984_3: Idampi hi kevalaṃ samathānuyogavasena paṭiladdhaṃ sasaṅkhārikaṃ,
tika-abh07t:984_5: Nayidamevaṃ maggādhigamavasenasattito paṭiladdhassāpi aparabhāge parikammavaseneva uppajjanato,
tika-abh07t:984_6: tasmā sabbassapi jhānassa parikammasaṅkhātapubbābhisaṅkhārena vinā kevalaṃ adhikāravasena anuppajjanato “asaṅkhārika”ntipi,
tika-abh07t:984_7: adhikārena ca vinā kevalaṃ parikammābhisaṅkhāreneva anuppajjanato “sasaṅkhārika”ntipi na sakkā vattunti.
tika-abh07t:984_8: Atha vā pubbābhisaṅkhāravaseneva uppajjamānassa na kadāci asaṅkhārikabhāvo sambhavatīti “asaṅkhārika”nti
tika-abh07t:985_7: appamāṇaṃ appamāṇārammaṇanti ārammaṇacatukkena yojitattā cattāro navakā,
tika-abh07t:985_9: dukkhappaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ parittaṃ appamāṇārammaṇa”ntyādinā ārammaṇappaṭipadāmissakanayavasena soḷasa
tika-abh07t:986_1: Jhānavisesena nibbattitavipāko ekantato taṃtaṃjhānasadisovāti vipākaṃ jhānasadisameva vibhattaṃ.
tika-abh07t:986_2: Imameva hi atthaṃ dīpetuṃ bhagavatā vipākaniddesepi kusalaṃ uddisitvāva tadanantaraṃ mahaggatalokuttaravipākā vibhattā.
tika-abh07t:987_1: Rūpāvacaramānasaṃ jhānabhedena pañcahi catūhi tīhi dvīhi puna dvīhi jhānaṅgehi sampayogabhedena pañcadhā
tika-abh07t:987_2: pañcaṅgikaṃ caturaṅgikaṃ tivaṅgikaṃ duvaṅgikaṃ puna duvaṅgikanti pañcavidhaṃ hoti avisesena,
tika-abh07t:987_3: puna taṃ puññapākakiriyānaṃ paccekaṃ pañcannaṃ pañcannaṃ bhedā pañcadasadhā bhavetyattho.
tika-abh07t:990_1: Idāni arūpāvacaraṃ ārammaṇabhedena catudhā vibhajitvā dassento āha “ākāsānañcāyatanā”tiādi.
tika-abh07t:990_5: “Anantākāsa”nti ca vattabbe “agyāhito”tyādīsu viya visesanassa paranipātavasena “ākāsānanta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t:990_7: Ākāsānañcameva āyatanaṃ sasampayuttadhammassa jhānassa adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena devānaṃ devāyatanaṃ viyāti ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ.
tika-abh07t:990_8: Tasmiṃ appanāppattaṃ paṭhamāruppajjhānampi idha “ākāsānañcāyatana”nti vuttaṃ yathā pathavīkasiṇārammaṇaṃ jhānaṃ “pathavīkasiṇa”nti.
tika-abh07t:990_9: Atha vā ākāsānañcaṃ āyatanaṃ assāti ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ, jhānaṃ,
tika-abh07t:991_2: Tañhi uppādādiantavantampi anantākāse pavattanato attānaṃ ārabbha pavattāya bhāvanāya uppādādiantaṃ aggahetvā
tika-abh07t:992_0: Nāssa paṭhamāruppassa kiñcanaṃ appamattakaṃ antamaso bhaṅgamattampi avasiṭṭhaṃ atthīti akiñcanaṃ,
tika-abh07t:993_1: sukhumāya ca saññāya atthitāya nevassa sasampayuttadhammassa saññā atthi,
tika-abh07t:993_6: Atha vā saññāva vipassanāya gocarabhāvaṃ gantvā nibbedajananasaṅkhātassa paṭusaññākiccassa abhāvato nevasaññā
tika-abh07t:993_7: ca uṇhodake tejodhātu viya saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvena vijjamānattā na asaññāti nevasaññānāsaññā,
tika-abh07t:993_8: sā eva āyatanaṃ imassa sasampayuttadhammassa jhānassa nissayādibhāvatoti nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ.
tika-abh07t:994_2: kasiṇākāsaviññāṇatadabhāvasaṅkhātānaṃ ālambitabbānañca ākāsādicatunnaṃ gocarānaṃ pabhedena āruppamānasaṃ catubbidhaṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t:994_3: Tañhi yathākkamaṃ pañcamajjhānārammaṇaṃ kasiṇanimittaṃ atikkamma tadugghāṭena laddhaṃ ākāsamālambitvā
tika-abh07t:994_4: tampi atikkamma tattha pavattaṃ viññāṇamālambitvā tampi atikkamma tadabhāvabhūtaṃ akiñcanabhāvamālambitvā
tika-abh07t:994_5: tampi atikkamma tattha pavattaṃ tatiyāruppaviññāṇamālambitvā pavattati,
tika-abh07t:994_6: na pana rūpāvacarakusalaṃ viya purimapurimaaṅgātikkamavasena purimapurimassāpi ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā.
tika-abh07t:1000_2: phalañca tadanurūpappavattiyā catudhā vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “sotāpattimaggacitta”ntyādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1000_4: nibbānamahāsamuddaninnatāya sotasadisattā vā “soto”ti vuccati ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo,
tika-abh07t:1000_5: tassa āpatti ādito pajjanaṃ pāpuṇanaṃ paṭhamasamannāgamo sotāpatti ā-
tika-abh07t:1000_12: Atha vā ariyamaggasotassa ādito pajjanaṃ etassāti sotāpatti, puggalo,
tika-abh07t:1001_0: Sakiṃ ekavāraṃ paṭisandhivasena imaṃ manussalokaṃ āgacchatīti sakadāgāmī,
tika-abh07t:1001_5: idha patvā tattha nibbattitvā idha parinibbāyīti pañcasu sakadāgāmīsu pañcamako idhādhippeto.
tika-abh07t:1001_6: So hi ito gantvā puna sakiṃ idha āgacchatīti.
tika-abh07t:1001_8: Kiñcāpi maggasamaṅgino tathāgamanāsambhavato phalaṭṭhoyeva sakadāgāmī nāma,
tika-abh07t:1001_9: tassa pana kāraṇabhūto purimuppanno maggo maggantarāvacchedanatthaṃ phalaṭṭhena visesetvā vuccati “sakadāgāmimaggo”ti.
tika-abh07t:1002_0: Paṭisandhivasena imaṃ kāmadhātuṃ na āgacchatīti anāgāmī,
tika-abh07t:1002_5: saṃsāracakkassa vā arā kilesā hatā anenāti arahā,
tika-abh07t:1003_1: saddena ekekassa maggassa nayasahassavasena catunnaṃ catusahassabhedaṃ saccavibhaṅge āgataṃ saṭṭhisahassabhedaṃ
tika-abh07t:1003_4: Sotāpattimaggo tāva jhānanāmena paṭipadābhedaṃ anāmasitvā kevalaṃ suññato appaṇihitoti dvidhā vibhatto,
tika-abh07t:1003_5: puna paṭipadācatukkena yojetvā paccekaṃ catudhā vibhattoti evaṃ jhānanāmena dasadhā vibhatto.
tika-abh07t:1003_7: paccekaṃ dasadasākārehi vibhatto tathā tathā bujjhanakānaṃ puggalānaṃ vasena.
tika-abh07t:1003_8: Tasmā jhānavasena dasamaggādīnaṃ ekūnavīsatiyā vasena dasa dasāti vīsatiyā ṭhānesu dve nayasatāni honti.
tika-abh07t:1003_9: Puna tāni catūhi adhipatīhi yojetvā paccekaṃ catudhā vibhattānīti evaṃ adhipatīhi amissetvā dve satāni,
tika-abh07t:1003_10: missetvā aṭṭha satānīti sotāpattimagge nayasahassaṃ hoti,
tika-abh07t:1004_2: sotāpattissa vā phalacittaṃ vipākabhūtaṃ cittaṃ sotāpattiphalacittaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1005_2: niravasesappahānaṃ kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ tanubhāvāpādanaṃ tesameva niravasesappahānaṃ rūpārūparāgamānuddhaccāvijjānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1005_3: anavasesappahānanti evaṃ saṃyojanappahānavasena catubbidhānaṃ sotāpattimaggādīnaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikamaggānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1005_5: vipākaṃ pana tasseva kusalassa phalattā tadanurūpato tathā catudhāti evaṃ anuttaraṃ attano uttaritarābhāvena
tika-abh07t:1005_6: anuttarasaṅkhātaṃ lokuttaraṃ cittaṃ aṭṭhadhā matanti yojanā.
tika-abh07t:1006_0: Kiriyānuttarassa pana asambhavato dvādasavidhatā na vuttā.
tika-abh07t:1006_5: Taṃ pana kilesasamucchedakavaseneva upalabhitabbato ekavārappavatteneva ca tena asanisampātena viya taruādīnaṃ
tika-abh07t:1006_6: samūlaviddhaṃsanassa taṃtaṃkilesānaṃ accantaṃ appavattiyā sādhitattā puna uppajjamānepi kātabbābhāvato
tika-abh07t:1006_7: diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthañca phalasamāpattiyā eva nibbānārammaṇavasena pavattanato na kadāci sekkhānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1010_1: Evaṃ jātivasena saṅgahaṃ dassetvā puna bhūmivasena dassetuṃ “catupaññāsadhā kāme”tyādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1010_5: anuttare pana navavidhe dhammasamudāye cittāni aṭṭhadhā īraye,
tika-abh07t:1010_7: Ettha ca kāmataṇhādivisayabhāvena kāmabhavādipariyāpannāni cittāni sakasakabhūmito aññattha pavattamānānipi kāmabhavādīsu cittānīti vuttāni,
tika-abh07t:1010_8: yathā manussitthiyā kucchismiṃ nibbattopi tiracchānagato tiracchānayonipariyāpannattā tiracchānesveva saṅgayhati.
tika-abh07t:1010_9: Katthaci apariyāpannāni navavidhalokuttaradhammasamūhekadesabhūtāni “rukkhe sākhā”tyādīsu viya anuttare cittānīti vuttāni.
tika-abh07t:1010_13: Natthi etesaṃ uttaraṃ cittanti anuttarānīti upayogabahuvacanavasena kāme kāmāvacarāni cittāni catupaññāsadhā īraye,
tika-abh07t:1010_16: Anuttare lokuttarāni cittāni aṭṭhadhā īrayeti evamettha sambandho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh07t:1011_1: Itthaṃ yathāvuttena jātibhedabhinnacatubhūmikacittabhedavasena ekūnanavutippabhedaṃ katvā mānasaṃ cittaṃ
tika-abh07t:1011_3: Atha vā ekavīsasataṃ ekuttaravīsādhikaṃ sataṃ vibhajanti.
tika-abh07t:1014_1: Jhānaṅgavasena paṭhamajjhānasadisattā paṭhamajjhānañca taṃ sotāpattimaggacittañceti paṭhamajjhānasotāpattimaggacittaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1014_3: hi aññataravasena taṃtaṃjhānasadisattā vitakkādiaṅgapātubhāvena cattāropi maggā paṭhamajjhānādivohāraṃ labhantā paccekaṃ pañcadhā vibhajanti.
tika-abh07t:1014_5: tattha paṭhamajjhānādīsu yaṃ yaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato tato vuṭṭhāya saṅkhāre sammasantassa vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā pavattā,
tika-abh07t:1014_7: Yaṃ yaṃ jhānaṃ sammasantassa sā pavattā,
tika-abh07t:1014_10: dutiyajjhānādīsu vā aññatarasadiso caturaṅgādibhedo maggo bhaveyyā”ti evaṃ yogāvacarassa uppannajjhāsayo puggalajjhāsayo nāma.
tika-abh07t:1015_0: Tattha yena paṭhamajjhānādīsu aññataraṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya pakiṇṇakasaṅkhāre sammasitvā maggo uppādito hoti,
tika-abh07t:1015_1: tassa so maggo paṭhamajjhānādīsu taṃtaṃpādakajjhānasadiso hoti.
tika-abh07t:1015_2: Sace pana vipassanāpādakaṃ kiñci jhānaṃ natthi,
tika-abh07t:1015_3: kevalaṃ paṭhamajjhānādīsu aññataraṃ jhānaṃ sammasitvā maggo uppādito hoti,

tika-abh07t:1029_4: Ayañhi arūpadhammopi samāno ārammaṇe phusanākāreneva pavattati,

tika-abh07t:1031_6: Vitakko hi sahajātadhammānaṃ ārammaṇe abhiniropanasabhāvattā te tattha pakkhipanto viya hoti,

tika-abh07t:1058_10: Attagāravavasena pāpato jigucchanato kulavadhū viya hirī,
