tika-abh07t:1562_6: Vānato taṇhāto muttattā sabbaso apagatattā vānamuttā.
tika-abh07t:1562_8: “Iti citta”ntyādi chahi paricchedehi vibhattānaṃ cittādīnaṃ nigamanaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1567_1: Salakkhaṇā cintanādisalakkhaṇā cittacetasikanipphannarūpanibbānavasena dvāsattatipabhedā vatthudhammā sabhāvadhammā vuttā,
tika-abh07t:1567_2: idāni tesaṃ yathāyogaṃ sabhāvadhammānaṃ ekekasamuccayavasena yogānurūpato akusalasaṅgahādibhedaṃ samuccayaṃ rāsiṃ pavakkhāmīti yojanā.
tika-abh07t:1568_3: saccābhisambodhisaṅkhātassa ariyamaggassa pakkhe bhavānaṃ bodhipakkhiyānaṃ dhammānaṃ satipaṭṭhānādibhedānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1570_2: vaṇato vā vissandamānayūsā viya cakkhādito visayesu vissandanato āsavā.
tika-abh07t:1570_3: Atha vā bhavato ābhavaggaṃ dhammato āgotrabhuṃ savanti pavattantīti āsavā.
tika-abh07t:1570_6: Tattha “āpāṭaliputtaṃ vuṭṭho devo”tyādīsu viya kiriyaṃ bahi katvā pavatto mariyādo.
tika-abh07t:1570_7: “Ābhavaggaṃ saddo abbhuggato”tyādīsu viya kiriyaṃ byāpetvā pavatto abhividhi.
tika-abh07t:1570_12: āgotrabhuñca savantesu mānādīsu attattaniyaggahaṇavasena abhibyāpanato madakaraṇaṭṭhena āsavasadisatāya ca eteyeva āsavabhāvena niruḷhāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1570_22: paṭiccasamuppādesu cāti aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu aññāṇaṃ avijjāsavo.
tika-abh07t:1571_2: ohananato vā heṭṭhā katvā hananato osīdāpanato “ogho”ti vuccati jalappavāho,
tika-abh07t:1571_3: ete ca satte ottharitvā hanantā vaṭṭasmiṃ satte osīdāpentā viya hontīti oghasadisatāya oghā,
tika-abh07t:1573_2: paccuppannakāyena vā anāgatakāyaṃ ganthenti duppamuñcaṃ veṭhentīti kāyaganthā.
tika-abh07t:1573_4: tadubhayena ca suddhīti evaṃ parato asabhāvato āmasanaṃ parāmāso.
tika-abh07t:1574_1: Maṇḍūkaṃ pannago viya bhusaṃ daḷhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ādiyantīti upādānāni.
tika-abh07t:1574_4: “Iminā me sīlavatādinā saṃsārasuddhī”ti evaṃ sīlavatādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ sīlabbatupādānaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1574_6: khandhehi byatirittābyatirittavasena vīsati parikappitassa attano vādo attavādo.
tika-abh07t:1575_1: Jhānādivasena uppajjanakakusalacittaṃ nisedhenti tathā tassa uppajjituṃ na dentīti nīvaraṇāni,
tika-abh07t:1575_3: Pañcasu kāmaguṇesu adhimattarāgasaṅkhāto kāmoyeva chandanaṭṭhena chando cāti kāmacchando.
tika-abh07t:1575_11: Kasmā panete bhinnadhammā dve dve ekanīvaraṇabhāvena vuttāti?
tika-abh07t:1580_1: Appahīnaṭṭhena anu anu santāne sentīti anusayā,
tika-abh07t:1580_3: Appahīnā hi kilesā kāraṇalābhe sati upajjanārahā santāne anu anu sayitā viya hontīti tadavatthā “anusayā”ti vuccanti.
tika-abh07t:1580_6: Na hi kālabhedena dhammānaṃ sabhāvabhedo atthi,
tika-abh07t:1580_8: nanu sabbepi kilesā appahīnā anusayā bhaveyyunti?
tika-abh07t:1580_10: atha kho appahīnaṭṭhena thāmagatā kilesā anusayāti.
tika-abh07t:1580_11: Thāmagamanañca anaññasādhāraṇo kāmarāgādīnameva āveṇiko sabhāvoti alaṃ vivādena.
tika-abh07t:1582_0: 12. Cittaṃ kilissati upatappati, bādhīyati vā etehīti kilesā.
tika-abh07t:1584_1: Āsavā ca oghā ca yogā ca ganthā ca vatthuto dhammato vuttanayena tayo.
tika-abh07t:1584_3: Nīvaraṇā aṭṭha siyuṃ thinamiddhauddhaccakukkuccānaṃ visuṃ gahaṇato.
tika-abh07t:1584_4: Anusayā chaḷeva honti kāmarāgabhavarāgānusayānaṃ taṇhāsabhāvena ekato gahitattā.
tika-abh07t:1584_5: Nava saṃyojanā matā ubhayattha vuttānaṃ taṇhāsabhāvānaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1584_9: Iti evaṃ pāpānaṃ akusalānaṃ saṅgaho navadhā vutto.
tika-abh07t:1593_1: Ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā cintanasaṅkhātena upanijjhāyanaṭṭhena yathārahaṃ paccanīkadhammajhāpanaṭṭhena ca
tika-abh07t:1593_2: jhānāni ca tāni aṅgāni ca samuditānaṃ avayavabhāvena aṅgīyanti ñāyantīti jhānaṅgāni.
tika-abh07t:1593_3: Avayavavinimuttassa ca samudāyassa abhāvepi senaṅgarathaṅgādayo viya visuṃ visuṃ aṅgabhāvena vuccanti ekato hutvā jhānabhāvena.
tika-abh07t:1594_14: Sammā sāmañca ādhīyati etena cittanti sammāsamādhi,
tika-abh07t:1595_8: ājānane aññabhāvibhāve ca ājānanādivasappavattehi sahajātehi attānaṃ anuvattāpentā dhammā issaraṭṭhena indriyāni nāmāti āha “cakkhundriya”ntyādi.
tika-abh07t:1595_9: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana aparepi indaliṅgaṭṭhādayo indriyaṭṭhā vuttā.
tika-abh07t:1595_12: catusaccadhammameva vā ñassāmī”ti evamajjhāsayena paṭipannassa indriyaṃ anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1595_13: Ājānāti paṭhamamaggena diṭṭhamariyādaṃ anatikkamitvā jānāti indriyañcāti aññindriyaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1595_14: Aññātāvino cattāri saccāni paṭivijjhitvā ṭhitassa arahato indriyaṃ aññātāvindriyaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1596_0: Ettha ca sattapaññattiyā visesanissayattā ajjhattikāyatanāni ādito vuttāni,
tika-abh07t:1596_1: manindriyaṃ pana ajjhattikāyatanabhāvasāmaññena ettheva vattabbampi arūpindriyehi saha ekato dassanatthaṃ jīvitindriyānantaraṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1596_2: sāyaṃ paññatti imesaṃ vasena “itthī puriso”ti vibhāgaṃ gacchatīti dassanatthaṃ tadanantaraṃ bhāvadvayaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1596_3: tayime upādinnadhammā imassa vasena tiṭṭhantīti dassanatthaṃ tato paraṃ jīvitindriyaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1596_4: sattasaññito dhammapuñjo pabandhavasena pavattamāno imāhi vedanāhi saṃkilissatīti dassanatthaṃ tato vedanāpañcakaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1596_5: tāhi pana visuddhikāmānaṃ vodānasambhāradassanatthaṃ tato saddhādipañcakaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1596_7: niṭṭhitakiccā ca hontīti dassanatthaṃ ante tīṇi vuttāni.
tika-abh07t:1596_8: Ettāvatā adhippetatthasiddhīti aññesaṃ aggahaṇanti idametesaṃ anukkamena desanāya kāraṇanti alamatippapañcena.
tika-abh07t:1597_2: sampayuttadhammesu thirabhāvena ca saddhādīni satta balāni,
tika-abh07t:1598_2: “Chandavato kiṃnāma na sijjhatī”tyādikaṃ hi pubbābhisaṅkhārūpanissayaṃ labhitvā uppajjamāne citte chandādayo
tika-abh07t:1598_3: dhurabhūtā sayaṃ sampayuttadhamme sādhayamānā hutvā pavattanti,
tika-abh07t:1598_7: Santesupi indriyantaresu kevalaṃ dassanādīsu cakkhuviññāṇādīhi anuvattāpanamattaṃ indriyatāti ayaṃ adhipatiindriyānaṃ viseso.
tika-abh07t:1599_7: Ajjhattikasantatiyā pana visesapaccayattā imeyeva cattāro “āhārā”ti vuttā.
tika-abh07t:1600_0: Kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkhānañhi sattānaṃ rūpakāyassa kabaḷīkārāhāro visesapaccayo kammādijanitassapi tassa
tika-abh07t:1600_4: Phassopi sukhādivatthubhūtaṃ ārammaṇaṃ phusantoyeva sukhādivedanāpavattanena sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā paccayo hoti.
tika-abh07t:1600_5: Manosañcetanā kusalākusalakammavasena āyūhamānāyeva bhavamūlanipphādanato sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā paccayo hoti.
tika-abh07t:1600_6: Viññāṇaṃ vijānantameva nāmarūpappavattanena sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā paccayo hotīti evameteyeva ajjhattasantānassa visesapaccayattā “āhārā”ti vuttā,
tika-abh07t:1601_1: Pañcaviññāṇānaṃ vitakkavirahena ārammaṇesu abhinipātamattattā tesu vijjamānānipi upekkhāsukhadukkhāni
tika-abh07t:1601_4: Dvipañcaviññāṇamanodhātuttikasantīraṇattikavasena soḷasacittesu vīriyābhāvato tattha vijjamānopi samādhi balabhāvaṃ na gacchati.
tika-abh07t:1601_6: Tathā aṭṭhārasāhetukesu hetuvirahato maggaṅgāni na labbhanti.
tika-abh07t:1601_7: “Hetupacchimakaṃ maggaṅga”nti hi vuttanti imamatthaṃ manasi nidhāyāha “dvipañcaviññāṇesū”tyādi.
tika-abh07t:1603_3: Na hi te chandādīni purakkhatvā pavattanti.
tika-abh07t:1603_4: Vīmaṃsādhipatino dvihetukajavanesu asambhavato cittābhisaṅkhārūpanissayassa ca sambhavānurūpato labbhamānataṃ sandhāyāha “yathāsambhava”nti.
tika-abh07t:1603_7: teneva hi bhagavatā “hetū hetusampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo”tyādinā hetupaccayaniddese
tika-abh07t:1604_2: jhānaṅgāni pañca somanassadomanassupekkhānaṃ vedanāvasena ekato gahitattā,
tika-abh07t:1604_3: maggaṅgā nava micchāsaṅkappavāyāmasamādhīnaṃ vitakkavīriyacittekaggatāsabhāvena sammāsaṅkappādīhi ekato gahitattā.
tika-abh07t:1604_5: tiṇṇaṃ lokuttarindriyānaṃ paññindriyassa ca ñāṇasāmaññena ekato gahitattā,
tika-abh07t:1604_9: āhārā tathā cattāro vuttāti kusalādīhi tīhi samākiṇṇo tatoyeva missakasaṅgaho evaṃnāmako saṅgaho sattadhā vutto.
tika-abh07t:1611_11: Tathā sarāgamahaggatādivasena sampayogabhūmibhedena bhinnasseva cittassa anupassanā cittānupassanā.
tika-abh07t:1612_2: So ca kiccabhedena catubbidhoti āha “cattāro sammappadhānā”tyādi.
tika-abh07t:1614_3: Yāya vā so satiādikāya dhammasāmaggiyā bujjhati saccāni paṭivijjhati,
tika-abh07t:1614_8: tassā vā bodhiyā aṅgabhūtā kāraṇabhūtāti bojjhaṅgā,
tika-abh07t:1615_1: “Sattadhā tattha saṅgaho”ti vatvāna puna taṃ dassetuṃ “saṅkappapassaddhi cā”tyādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1615_7: Eso uttamānaṃ bodhipakkhiyabhāvena visiṭṭhānaṃ sattatiṃsa dhammānaṃ pavaro uttamo vibhāgo.
tika-abh07t:1616_1: Lokuttare aṭṭhavidhepi sabbe sattatiṃsa dhammā honti,
tika-abh07t:1616_4: catutthapañcamajjhānike pītiyā ca asambhavato na honti vā,
tika-abh07t:1616_5: lokiyepi citte sīlavisuddhādi chabbisuddhipavattiyaṃ yathāyogaṃ taṃtaṃkiccassa anurūpavasena keci katthaci visuṃ visuṃ honti,
tika-abh07t:1619_1: Atītānāgatapaccuppannādibhedabhinnā te te sabhāgadhammā ekajjhaṃ rāsaṭṭhena khandhā.
tika-abh07t:1619_4: te panete khandhā bhājanabhojanabyañjanabhattakārakabhuñjakavikappavasena pañceva vuttāti āha “rūpakkhandho”tyādi.
tika-abh07t:1620_2: te pana upādānavisayabhāvena gahitā rūpādayo pañcevāti vuttaṃ “rūpupādānakkhandho”tyādi.
tika-abh07t:1621_1: Āyatanti ettha taṃtaṃdvārārammaṇā cittacetasikā tena tena kiccena ghaṭṭenti vāyamanti,
tika-abh07t:1621_2: āyabhūte vā te dhamme etāni tanonti vitthārenti,
tika-abh07t:1621_12: ārammaṇabhūtāni ca bāhirāyatanāni chāti dvādasavidhānīti āha “cakkhāyatana”ntyādi.
tika-abh07t:1622_0: Ettha ajjhattikāyatanesu sanidassanasappaṭighārammaṇattā cakkhāyatanaṃ vibhūtanti taṃ paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1622_3: itaresu sīghataraṃ ārammaṇaggahaṇasamatthattā ghānāyatanaṃ paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1622_4: Purato ṭhapitamattassa hi bhojanādikassa gandho vātānusārena ghāne paṭihaññati,
tika-abh07t:1622_8: yathāvuttānaṃ pana anukkamena tesaṃ tesaṃ ārammaṇāni rūpāyatanādīni vuttāni.
tika-abh07t:1623_2: Atha vā yathāsambhavaṃ anekappakāraṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ vidahanti,
tika-abh07t:1623_3: bhārahārehi viya ca bhāro sattehi dhīyanti dhāriyanti,
tika-abh07t:1623_8: haritālamanosilādiselāvayavadhātuyo viya ca ñeyyāvayavabhūtā cāti dhātuyo. Yathāhu –
tika-abh07t:1625_0: Etāya dhīyate ettha, iti vā dhātusammatā;
tika-abh07t:1627_0: Tā pana manāyatanaṃ sattaviññāṇadhātuvasena sattadhā bhinditvā avasesehi ekādasāyatanehi saha aṭṭhārasadhātū vuttāti āha “cakkhudhātū”tyādi.
tika-abh07t:1628_4: cattāro phalaṭṭheti aṭṭhaariyapuggale sādhenti asati saccappaṭivedhe tesaṃ ariyabhāvānupagamanato,
tika-abh07t:1628_5: sati ca tasmiṃ ekantena tabbhāvūpagamanato ca.
tika-abh07t:1628_6: Dukkhasamudayanirodhamaggānameva pana yathākkamaṃ bādhakattaṃ pabhavattaṃ nissaraṇattaṃ niyyānikattaṃ, nāññesaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1633_1: ariyassa vā sammāsambuddhassa saccāni tena desitattāti ariyasaccāni.
tika-abh07t:1633_2: Tāni pana saṃkiliṭṭhāsaṃkiliṭṭhaphalahetuvasena catubbidhānīti āha “cattāri ariyasaccānī”tyādi.
tika-abh07t:1633_5: Kammādipaccayasanniṭṭhāne dukkhuppattinimittatāya samudayo samudeti etasmā dukkhanti katvā,
tika-abh07t:1634_3: nibbānassa ca vasena ekūnasattati dhammā āyatanesu dhammāyatanaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1635_1: Sesā cetasikāti vedanāsaññāhi sesā paññāsa cetasikā.
tika-abh07t:1635_5: asubhe subhādisaññāvipallāsavasena ca tassā tadākārappavattīti tadupakaraṇabhūtā saññā,
tika-abh07t:1635_6: tasmā saṃsārassa padhānahetutāya etā vinibhujjitvā desitāti.
tika-abh07t:1638_3: Atītādibhedabhinnānañhi rāsaṭṭhena khandhavohāroti nibbānaṃ bhedābhāvato khandhasaṅgahato nissaṭaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1639_2: channaṃ ārammaṇānañca bhedena āyatanāni dvādasa bhavanti,
tika-abh07t:1639_3: channaṃ dvārānaṃ channaṃ ārammaṇānaṃ tadubhayaṃ nissāya uppannānaṃ tattakānameva viññāṇānaṃ pariyāyena kamena dhātuyo aṭṭhārasa bhavanti.
tika-abh07t:1640_9: Kasmā pana aññesupi dukkhahetūsu santesu taṇhāyeva samudayoti vuttāti?
tika-abh07t:1640_12: hi kammasahāyabhāvūpagamanena ca dukkhavicittatākāraṇattā taṇhā dukkhassa visesakāraṇanti.
tika-abh07t:1640_13: Maggo dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadānāmena vutto maggo lokuttaro matoti maggoti puna maggaggahaṇaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1641_1: Maggayuttā aṭṭhaṅgikavinimuttā sesā maggasampayuttā phassādayo phalañceva sasampayuttanti ete catūhi saccehi vinissaṭā viniggatā nippariyāyato,
tika-abh07t:1641_2: pariyāyato pana aññātāvindriyaniddesepi “maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpanna”nti vuttattā phaladhammesu sammādiṭṭhādīnaṃ maggasacce,
tika-abh07t:1641_3: itaresañca maggaphalasampayuttānaṃ saṅkhāradukkhasāmaññena dukkhasacce saṅgaho sakkā kātuṃ.
tika-abh07t:1641_4: Evañhi sati saccadesanāyapi sabbasaṅgāhikatā upapannā hoti.
tika-abh07t:1641_5: Kasmā panete khandhādayo bahū dhammā vuttāti?
tika-abh07t:1641_11: Tesu nāmasammuḷhānaṃ khandhaggahaṇaṃ nāmassa tattha catudhā vibhattattā,
tika-abh07t:1641_12: rūpasammuḷhānaṃ āyatanaggahaṇaṃ rūpassa tattha aḍḍhekādasadhā vibhattattā,
tika-abh07t:1641_13: ubhayamuḷhānaṃ dhātuggahaṇaṃ ubhayesampi tattha vitthārato vibhattattā,
tika-abh07t:1641_16: Taṃ panetaṃ tividhampi pavattinivattitadubhayahetuvasena diṭṭhameva upakārāvahaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1646_1: Idāni yathāvuttanāmarūpadhammānaṃ paṭiccasamuppādapaṭṭhānanayavasena paccaye dassetuṃ “yesa”ntyādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1646_2: Yesaṃ paccayehi saṅkhatattā saṅkhatānaṃ paccayuppannadhammānaṃ ye paccayadhammā yathā yenākārena paccayā ṭhitiyā,
tika-abh07t:1646_6: tassa ca paccayākārassa pabhedaṃ iha imasmiṃ samuccayasaṅgahānantare ṭhāne yathārahaṃ taṃtaṃpaccayuppannadhamme
tika-abh07t:1646_7: sati taṃtaṃpaccayānaṃ taṃtaṃpaccayabhāvākārānurūpaṃ idāni pavakkhāmīti yojanā.
tika-abh07t:1647_1: Tattha paccayasāmaggiṃ paṭicca samaṃ gantvā phalānaṃ uppādo etasmāti paṭiccasamuppādo,
tika-abh07t:1648_2: Tassa paccayadhammassa bhāvena bhavanasīlassa bhāvo tabbhāvabhāvībhāvo,
tika-abh07t:1648_14: āhacca visesetvā pavattā paccayasaṅkhātā ṭhiti āhaccapaccayaṭṭhiti.
tika-abh07t:1648_15: Paṭiccasamuppādanayo hi tabbhāvabhāvībhāvākāramattaṃ upādāya pavattattā hetādipaccayaniyamavisesaṃ anapekkhitvā avisesatova pavattati,
tika-abh07t:1648_16: ayaṃ pana hetāditaṃtaṃpaccayānaṃ tassa tassa dhammantarassa taṃtaṃpaccayabhāvasāmatthiyākāravisesaṃ upādāya
tika-abh07t:1648_18: Keci pana “āhacca kaṇṭhatāluādīsu paharitvā vuttā ṭhiti āhaccapaccayaṭṭhitī”ti vaṇṇenti.
tika-abh07t:1648_19: Taṃ pana savanamatteneva tesaṃ avahasitabbavacanataṃ pakāseti.
tika-abh07t:1648_21: añño vā koci nayo kaṇṭhatāluādīsu anāhacca desetuṃ sakkāti.
tika-abh07t:1648_22: Vomissetvāti paṭṭhānanayampi paṭiccasamuppādeyeva pakkhipitvā tabbhāvabhāvībhāvena hetādipaccayavasena
tika-abh07t:1648_23: ca missetvā ācariyā saṅgahakārādayo papañcenti vitthārenti,
tika-abh07t:1650_4: veditabbaṃ vā catusaccādikaṃ na viditaṃ karoti,

tika-abh07t:1651_1: Chaḷārammaṇādivasena pana aṭṭhasatappabhedā honti kāmupādānādivasena cattāri upādānāni.
tika-abh07t:1651_2: Ettha ca dubbalā taṇhā taṇhā nāma,
tika-abh07t:1651_4: Asampattavisayapatthanā vā taṇhā tamasi corānaṃ hatthappasāraṇaṃ viya,
tika-abh07t:1651_5: sampattavisayaggahaṇaṃ upādānaṃ corānaṃ hatthappattassa gahaṇaṃ viya.
tika-abh07t:1651_11: Tattha paṭhamo bhavati etasmā phalanti bhavo,
tika-abh07t:1651_17: So hi jātiyā paccayo hoti, na itaro.
tika-abh07t:1651_19: na ca tadeva tassa kāraṇaṃ yuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1651_20: Tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ taṃtaṃgatiādīsu attabhāvapaṭilābho jāti.
tika-abh07t:1651_27: Ñātibyasanādīhi phuṭṭhassa adhimattacetodukkhappabhāvito bhuso āyāso upāyāso.
tika-abh07t:1652_0: Ettha ca satipi vatthārammaṇādike paccayantare avijjādiekekapaccayaggahaṇaṃ padhānabhāvato,
tika-abh07t:1652_2: Ettha ca avijjānusayiteyeva santāne saṅkhārānaṃ vipākadhammabhāvena pavattanato avijjāpaccayāsaṅkhārāsambhavanti,
tika-abh07t:1652_7: saḷāyatanañca nāmarūpanissayameva chabbidhaphassassa dvārabhāvena yathārahaṃ pavattati,
tika-abh07t:1652_10: Na hi dvārābhāve tassuppatti siyāti saḷāyatanapaccayā phasso.
tika-abh07t:1652_13: Vedanīyesu ca dhammesu assādānupassino vedanāhetukā taṇhā samuṭṭhātīti vedanāpaccayā taṇhā.
tika-abh07t:1652_14: Taṇhāsinehapipāsitāyeva ca upādāniyesu dhammesu upādāya daḷhabhāvāya saṃvattanti.
tika-abh07t:1652_15: Taṇhāya hi rūpādīni assādetvā assādetvā kāmesu pātabyataṃ āpajjantīti taṇhā kāmupādānassa paccayo.
tika-abh07t:1652_16: Tathā rūpādibhedegadhito “natthi dinna”ntyādinā micchādassanaṃ saṃsārato muccitukāmo asuddhimagge suddhimaggaparāmāsaṃ
tika-abh07t:1652_19: Yathārahaṃ sampayogānusayavasena upādānapatiṭṭhitāyeva sattā kammāyūhanāya saṃvattantīti upādānaṃ bhavassa paccayo.
tika-abh07t:1652_21: Bījato aṅkuro viya tattha tattha samupalabbhatīti bhavo jātiyā paccayo nāma.
tika-abh07t:1652_23: Na hi ajātānaṃ jarāmaraṇasambhavo hotīti jāti jarāmaraṇānaṃ paccayoti evametesaṃ tabbhāvabhāvībhāvo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh07t:1653_0: Evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotīti yathāvuttena paccayaparamparavidhinā,
tika-abh07t:1653_1: na pana issaranimmānādīhi etassa vaṭṭasaṅkhātassa kevalassa sukhādīhi asammissassa,
tika-abh07t:1653_2: sakalassa vā dukkhakkhandhassa dukkharāsissa na sukhasubhādīnaṃ samudayo nibbatti hoti.
tika-abh07t:1654_0: 5. Atati satataṃ gacchati pavattatīti addhā, kālo.
tika-abh07t:1655_2: addhāggahaṇena ca avijjādīnaṃ dhammānameva gahaṇaṃ tabbinimuttassa kassaci kālassa anupalabbhanato.
tika-abh07t:1655_3: Niruddhānuppādā eva hi dhammā atītānāgatakālavasena uppādādikkhaṇattayapariyāpannā ca paccuppannakālavasena voharīyanti.
tika-abh07t:1655_4: Jātijarāmaraṇaṃ anāgato addhā paccuppannahetuto anāgate nibbattanato.
tika-abh07t:1655_5: Majjhe paccuppanno addhā atītahetuto idha nibbattanakaphalasabhāvattā,
tika-abh07t:1655_6: anāgataphalassa idha hetusabhāvattā ca majjhe viññāṇādīni aṭṭhaṅgāni paccuppanno addhā.
tika-abh07t:1657_1: Taṇhupādānabhavāpi gahitā hontīti kilesabhāvasāmaññato avijjāggahaṇena taṇhupādānāni,
tika-abh07t:1657_3: Tathā taṇhupādānabhavaggahaṇena ca avijjāsaṅkhārā gahitāti sambandho.
tika-abh07t:1657_4: Etthāpi vuttanayena tesaṃ gahaṇena tesaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo,
tika-abh07t:1657_5: viññāṇanāmarūpasaḷāyatanaphassavedanānaṃ jātijarābhaṅgāva jātijarāmaraṇanti ca vuttāti āha “jātijarāmaraṇaggahaṇenā”tyādi.
tika-abh07t:1658_1: Atīte hetavo pañcāti sarūpato vuttānaṃ dvinnaṃ avijjāsaṅkhārānaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1658_2: saṅgahavasena gahitānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ taṇhupādānabhavānañca vasena paccuppannaphalassa paccayā atītabhave nibbattā hetavo pañca,
tika-abh07t:1658_3: idāni phalapañcakanti atītahetupaccayā idha paccuppanne nibbattaṃ viññāṇādiphalapañcakaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1658_4: Idāni hetavo pañcāti sarūpato vuttānaṃ taṇhādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1658_5: saṅgahato laddhānaṃ avijjāsaṅkhārānaṃ dvinnañca vasena āyatiṃ phalassa paccayā idāni hetavo pañca.
tika-abh07t:1658_6: Āyatiṃ phalapañcakanti jātijarāmaraṇaggahaṇena vuttaṃ paccuppannahetupaccayā anāgate nibbattanakaviññāṇādiphalapañcakanti
tika-abh07t:1658_7: evaṃ vīsati atītādīsu tattha tattha ākiriyantīti ākārā.
tika-abh07t:1659_1: idāni phalapañcakassa ca antarā eko sandhi,
tika-abh07t:1659_5: āyatiṃ phalassa ca antarā ekoti evaṃ tisandhi.
tika-abh07t:1659_10: Ettha hi hetutophalassa avicchedappavattibhāvato hetuphalasambandhabhūto paṭhamo sandhi,
tika-abh07t:1659_12: dutiyo pana phalato hetuno avicchedappavattibhāvato phalahetusambandhabhūto.
tika-abh07t:1659_13: Phalabhūtopi hi dhammo aññassa hetusabhāvassa dhammassa paccayoti.
tika-abh07t:1659_18: etarahi hetu āyatiṃ vipākoti cattāro saṅkhepāti catusaṅkhepā.
tika-abh07t:1660_1: Kammabhavasaṅkhāto bhavekadesoti ettha āyatiṃ paṭisandhiyā paccayacetanā bhavo nāma,
tika-abh07t:1660_2: purimakammabhavasmiṃ idha paṭisandhiyā paccayacetanā saṅkhārāti veditabbā.
tika-abh07t:1660_3: Avasesā cāti viññāṇādipañcakajātijarāmaraṇavasena sattavidhā paccuppannaphalavasena vuttadhammā.
tika-abh07t:1660_4: Upapattibhavasaṅkhāto bhavekadesoti pana anāgatapariyāpannā veditabbā. Bhava-
tika-abh07t:1661_0: 12. Pubbantassa avijjā mūlaṃ. Aparantassa taṇhā mūlanti āha avijjātaṇhāvasena dve mūlānī”ti.
tika-abh07t:1662_1: Tesameva avijjātaṇhāsaṅkhātānaṃ vaṭṭamūlānaṃ nirodhena anuppādadhammatāpattiyā saccappaṭivedhato siddhāya appavattiyā vaṭṭaṃ nirujjhati.
tika-abh07t:1662_2: Abhiṇhaso abhikkhaṇaṃ jarāmaraṇasaṅkhātāya mucchāya pīḷitānaṃ sattānaṃ sokādisamappitānaṃ kāmāsavādiāsavānaṃ samuppādato puna avijjā ca pavattati.
tika-abh07t:1662_6: Iccevaṃ vuttanayena ābaddhaṃ avicchinnaṃ anādikaṃ ādirahitaṃ tibhūmakapariyāpannattā tebhūmakaṃ kilesakammavipākavasena
tika-abh07t:1662_7: tivaṭṭabhūtaṃ paṭiccasamuppādoti paṭṭhapesi paññapesi mahāmuni sammāsambuddho.
tika-abh07t:1665_1: Evaṃ paṭiccasamuppādanayaṃ vibhāgato dassetvā idāni paṭṭhānanayaṃ dassetuṃ “hetupaccayo”tyādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1665_5: Hinoti vā etena kammanidānabhūtena uddhaṃ ojaṃ abhiharantena mūlena viya pādapo tappaccayaṃ phalaṃ gacchati
tika-abh07t:1665_7: Hetu ca so paccayo cāti hetupaccayo.
tika-abh07t:1665_11: upakāraṭṭhena paccayoti saṅkhepato mūlaṭṭhena upakārako dhammo hetupaccayo.
tika-abh07t:1665_13: paṭisandhiyaṃ kammasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ ubhayattha sampayuttānaṃ nāmadhammānañca rukkhassa mūlāni
tika-abh07t:1666_0: Ālambīyati dubbalena viya daṇḍādikaṃ cittacetasikehi gayhatīti ārammaṇaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1666_1: Cittacetasikā hi yaṃ yaṃ dhammaṃ ārabbha pavattanti,
tika-abh07t:1666_2: te te dhammā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayo nāma.
tika-abh07t:1667_0: Na vijjati paccayuppannena saha antaraṃ etassa paccayassāti anantarapaccayo.
tika-abh07t:1667_2: Attano attano anantaraṃ anurūpacittuppādajananasamattho purimapurimaniruddho dhammo “anantarapaccayo”,
tika-abh07t:1667_6: Na hi tesaṃ atthato bhedo upalabbhati.
tika-abh07t:1667_9: taṃ “nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ phalasamāpattiyā samanantarapaccayena paccayo”tyādīhi virujjhati.
tika-abh07t:1667_10: Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ hi sattāhādikālaṃ niruddhaṃ phalasamāpattiyā samanantarapaccayo,
tika-abh07t:1667_11: tasmā abhinivesaṃ akatvā byañjanamattatovettha nānākaraṇaṃ paccetabbaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1667_13: Pubbadhammanirodhassa hi pacchājātadhammuppādanassa ca antarābhāvena uppādanasamatthatāya nirodho anantarapaccayatā,
tika-abh07t:1667_16: idaṃ samantato”ti attanā ekattaṃ upanetvā viya suṭṭhu anantarabhāvena uppādetuṃ samatthaṃ hutvā nirodho
tika-abh07t:1667_18: Nirodhapaccayassapi hi nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa asaññuppattiyā purimassa ca cuticittassa kālantarepi
tika-abh07t:1667_19: uppajjantānaṃ phalapaṭisandhīnaṃ antarā samānajātiyena arūpadhammena byavadhānābhāvato bhinnajātikānañca
tika-abh07t:1667_20: rūpadhammānaṃ byavadhānakaraṇe asamatthatāya nirantaruppādane ekattaṃ upanetvā viya uppādane ca samatthatā
tika-abh07t:1667_22: tasmā dhammato avisesepi tathā tathā bujjhanakānaṃ veneyyānaṃ vasena upasaggatthavisesamattatova bhedo paccetabboti.
tika-abh07t:1668_0: Attano anuppattiyā sahuppannānampi anuppattito pakāsassa padīpo viya sahuppannānaṃ sahuppādabhāvena paccayo sahajātapaccayo,
tika-abh07t:1669_0: Aññamaññaṃ upatthambhayamānaṃ tidaṇḍaṃ viya attano upakārakadhammānaṃ upatthambhakabhāvena paccayo aññamaññapaccayo.
tika-abh07t:1669_3: Tathā hi sahajātapaccayabhāvīyeva koci aññamaññapaccayo na hoti cittajarūpānaṃ sahajātapaccayabhāvino
tika-abh07t:1669_4: nāmassa upādārūpānaṃ sahajātapaccayabhāvīnaṃ mahābhūtānañca aññamaññapaccayabhāvassa anuddhaṭattā.
tika-abh07t:1669_5: Yadi hi sahajātabhāveneva attano upakārakānaṃ upakārakatā aññamaññapaccayatā siyā,
tika-abh07t:1670_0: Cittakammassa paṭo viya sahajātanāmarūpānaṃ nissayabhūtā catukkhandhā,
tika-abh07t:1670_1: tarupabbatādīnaṃ pathavī viya ādhāraṇatoyeva sahajātarūpasattaviññāṇadhātūnaṃ yathākkamaṃ nissayā bhūtarūpaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1670_2: vatthu cāti ime nissayapaccayo nāma nissīyati nissitakehīti katvā,
tika-abh07t:1671_1: cha ārammaṇāni cāti ime paccayuppannato paṭhamaṃ uppajjitvā pavattamānabhāvena upakārako purejātapaccayo.
tika-abh07t:1671_2: Pacchājātapaccaye asati santānaṭṭhitihetubhāvaṃ āgacchantassa kāyassa upatthambhanabhāvena upakārakā
tika-abh07t:1671_4: So gijjhapotakasarīrānaṃ āhārāsā cetanā viya daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh07t:1672_0: Purimapurimaparicitagantho viya uttarauttaraganthassa kusalādibhāvena attasadisassa paguṇabalavabhāvavisiṭṭhaattasamānajātiyatāgāhaṇaṃ āsevanaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1672_2: Bhinnajātikā hi bhinnajātikehi āsevanapaguṇena paguṇabalavabhāvavisiṭṭhaṃ kusalādibhāvasaṅkhātaṃ attano gatiṃ gāhāpetuṃ na sakkonti,
tika-abh07t:1672_4: te pana anantarātītāni lokiyakusalākusalāni ceva anāvajjanakiriyajavanāni cāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1673_0: Attano nirussāhasantabhāvena sahajātanāmarūpānaṃ nirussāhasantabhāvāya upakārakā vipākacittacetasikā vipākapaccayo.
tika-abh07t:1673_1: Te hi payogena asādhetabbatāya kammassa kaṭattā nipphajjamānamattato nirussāhasantabhāvā honti,
tika-abh07t:1674_0: Rūpārūpānaṃ upatthambhakattena upakārakā cattāro āhārā āhārapaccayo.
tika-abh07t:1674_1: Satipi hi janakabhāve upatthambhakattameva āhārassa padhānakiccaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1674_2: Janayantopi āhāro avicchedavasena upatthambhento va janetīti upatthambhakabhāvo va āhārabhāvo.
tika-abh07t:1674_3: Tesu tesu kiccesu paccayuppannadhammehi attānaṃ anuvattāpanasaṅkhātādhipatiyaṭṭhena paccayo indriyapaccayo.
tika-abh07t:1675_2: duggahito pāpato vā niyyānaṭṭhena upakārakā sammādiṭṭhādayo maggapaccayo.
tika-abh07t:1676_0: Paramatthato bhinnāpi ekībhāvagatā viya ekuppādādibhāvasaṅkhātasampayogalakkhaṇena upakārakā nāmadhammā va sampayuttapaccayo.
tika-abh07t:1676_1: Aññamaññasambandhatāya yuttāpi samānā vippayuttabhāvena visaṃsaṭṭhatāya nānattupagamanena upakārakā vatthucittacetasikā vippayuttapaccayo.
tika-abh07t:1677_0: Paccuppannasabhāvasaṅkhātena atthibhāvena tādisasseva dhammassa upatthambhakattena upakārakā “sahajātaṃ
tika-abh07t:1677_2: Satipi hi janakatte ṭhitiyaṃyeva sātisayo atthipaccayānaṃ byāpāroti upatthambhakatāva tesaṃ gahitā.
tika-abh07t:1677_3: Ekasmiṃ phassādisamudāye pavattamāne dutiyassa abhāvato attano ṭhitiyā okāsaṃ alabhantānaṃ anantaramuppajjamānakacittacetasikānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1678_0: Attano sabhāvāvigamanena appavattamānānaṃ vigatabhāvena upakārakāyeva dhammā vigatapaccayo.
tika-abh07t:1678_3: nirodhānupagamanavasena upakārakatā avigatapaccayatāti paccayatāviseso nesaṃ dhammāvisesepi daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh07t:1678_4: Dhammānañhi samatthatāvisesaṃ sabbākārena ñatvā bhagavatā catuvīsatipaccayā desitāti bhagavati saddhāya
tika-abh07t:1678_5: “evaṃ visesā ete dhammā”ti sutamayañāṇaṃ uppādetvā cintābhāvanāmayañāṇehi tadabhisamayāya yogo karaṇīyo.
tika-abh07t:1678_6: Avisesepi hi dhammasāmaggiyassa tathā tathā vinetabbapuggalānaṃ vasena heṭṭhā vuttopi paccayo puna pakārantena
tika-abh07t:1678_7: vuccati ahetukadukaṃ vatvāpi hetuvippayuttadukaṃ viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1679_1: Nāmaṃ catukkhandhasaṅkhātaṃ nāmaṃ tādisasseva nāmassa chadhā chahākārehi paccayo hoti,
tika-abh07t:1679_2: tadeva nāmarūpīnaṃ samuditānaṃ pañcadhā paccayo hoti,
tika-abh07t:1679_3: rūpassa puna bhūtupādāyabhedassa ekadhā paccayo hoti,
tika-abh07t:1679_5: paññattināmarūpāni nāmassa dvidhā dvippakārā paccayā honti,
tika-abh07t:1679_6: dvayaṃ pana nāmarūpadvayaṃ samuditaṃ dvayassa tādisasseva nāmarūpadvayassa navadhā paccayo ceti evaṃ paccayā chabbidhā ṭhitā.
tika-abh07t:1680_1: Vipākabyākataṃ kammavasena vipākabhāvappattaṃ kammavegakkhittapatitaṃ viya hutvā pavattamānaṃ attano
tika-abh07t:1680_2: sabhāvaṃ gāhetvā paribhāvetvā neva aññaṃ pavatteti,
tika-abh07t:1680_4: “Na maggapaccayā āsevane eka”nti vacanato ca ahetukakiriyesu hasituppādasseva āsevanatāuddharaṇena āvajjanadvayaṃ āsevanapaccayo na hoti,
tika-abh07t:1680_5: tasmā javanāneva āsevanapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchantīti āha “purimāni javanānī”tyādi.
tika-abh07t:1680_6: Avisesavacanepettha lokiyakusalākusalābyākatajavanāneva daṭṭhabbāni lokuttarajavanānaṃ āsevanabhāvassa anuddhaṭattā.
tika-abh07t:1681_0: Evañca katvā vuttaṃ paṭṭhānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “lokuttaro pana āsevanapaccayo nāma natthī”ti.
tika-abh07t:1681_1: Tattha hi kusalaṃ bhinnajātikassa purecarattā na tena āsevanaguṇaṃ gaṇhāpeti,
tika-abh07t:1681_2: phalacittāni ca javanavasena uppajjamānānipi vipākābyākate vuttanayena āsevanaṃ na gaṇhanti,
tika-abh07t:1681_7: Maggo pana gotrabhuto āsevanaṃ na gaṇhātīti natthi bhūmiādivasena nānājātitāya anadhippetattā.
tika-abh07t:1681_8: Tathā hi vuttaṃ paṭṭhāne “gotrabhu maggassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo,
tika-abh07t:1681_10: Ekuppādādicatubbidhasampayogalakkhaṇābhāvato sahuppannānampi rūpadhammānaṃ sampayuttapaccayatā natthīti vuttaṃ “cittacetasikā dhammā aññamañña”nti.
tika-abh07t:1682_1: Hetujhānaṅgamaggaṅgāni sahajātānaṃ nāma rūpānanti tayopete paṭisandhiyaṃ kammasamuṭṭhānānaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1682_3: ubhayattha sahajātānaṃ nāmānañca hetādipaccayena paccayā honti.
tika-abh07t:1682_7: Sahajātānaṃ nāma rūpānanti sabbāpi cetanā nāmānaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1682_10: Nānākkhaṇikā cetanāti vipākakkhaṇato nānākkhaṇe atītabhavādīsu nibbattā kusalākusalacetanā.
tika-abh07t:1682_13: Kammasamuṭṭhānampi hi rūpaṃ vipākavohāraṃ na labhati arūpadhammabhāvena,
tika-abh07t:1683_1: Purejātassa imassa kāyassāti paccayadhammato pure uppannassa imassa rūpakāyassa.
tika-abh07t:1683_2: Kathaṃ pana paccayuppannassa pure nibbattiyaṃ pacchājātassa paccayatāti?
tika-abh07t:1683_4: tasmā santānappavattassa hetubhāvupatthambhane imassa byāpāroti na koci virodho.
tika-abh07t:1684_3: hadayavatthuno ca paṭisandhiviññāṇena sahuppannassa purejātakatābhāvato vuttaṃ “chavatthūni pavattiya”nti.
tika-abh07t:1684_4: “Pañcārammaṇāni pañcaviññāṇavīthiyā”ti ca idaṃ ārammaṇapurejātaniddese āgataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1684_5: Pañhāvāre pana “sekkhā vā puthujjanā vā cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassantī”tyādinā avisesena
tika-abh07t:1684_6: paccuppannacakkhādīnampi gahitattā dhammārammaṇampi ārammaṇapurejātaṃ manoviññāṇavīthiyā labbhati.
tika-abh07t:1685_1: Pakatiyā eva paccayantararahitena attano sabhāveneva upanissayo pakatūpanissayo.
tika-abh07t:1685_2: Ārammaṇānantarehi asaṃmisso puthageva koci upanissayoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t:1685_6: so attano phalassa uppādanasamatthabhāvena santāne nipphāditabhāvaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1685_8: tasmā attano santāne nipphanno rāgādi, saddhādi,
tika-abh07t:1686_2: Tathā hi “dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhatī”tyādinā dānasīlauposathakammapubbekatasuciṇṇajhānagotrabhuvodānamaggādīni
tika-abh07t:1686_3: garuṃ katvā paccavekkhaṇavasena assa niddeso pavatto.
tika-abh07t:1687_1: “Purimā purimā kusalā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ kusalānaṃ khandhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo”tyādinā
tika-abh07t:1687_2: nayena anantarapaccayena saddhiṃ nānattaṃ akatvā anantarūpanissayassa āgatattā vuttaṃ “anantaraniruddhā”tyādi.
tika-abh07t:1687_3: Evaṃ santepi attano anantaraṃ anurūpacittuppādavasena anantarapaccayo,
tika-abh07t:1691_0: Atha vā ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca kusalādidhammānanti yathāṭhitavaseneva yojanā attano hi rāgādayo ca attano
tika-abh07t:1691_1: kusalādidhammānaṃ kalyāṇamittassa saddhādike nissāya kusalaṃ karontānaṃ paresañca nissayā honti.
tika-abh07t:1692_2: rāgādihetukā ca uparūparirāgādayo hontīti yathārahaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1692_3: Yaṃ yañhi nissāya yassa yassa sambhavo,
tika-abh07t:1692_4: taṃ taṃ tassa tassa pakatūpanissayo hoti.
tika-abh07t:1692_10: tathā kalyāṇamittānaṃ saddhādayo upanissāya paresañca dānasīlādayo hontīti pākaṭametaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1693_2: paccayā hontī”ti saṅkhepena vuttamatthaṃ vitthāretuṃ “tattha garukatamārammaṇa”ntyādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1693_4: Tañhi jhānamaggaphalavipassanānibbānādibhedaṃ paccavekkhaṇaassādādimaggaphalādidhamme attādhīne karotīti ārammaṇādhipati nāma.
tika-abh07t:1693_9: vasena catubbidhopi sahajātādhipati yathārahaṃ sahajātanāmarūpānaṃ pavattiyaṃyeva sahajātādhipativasena paccayo.
tika-abh07t:1694_1: Rūpadhammassa arūpadhammaṃ pati sahajātapaccayatā paṭisandhiyaṃ vatthuvasena vuttāti āha “vatthuvipākā aññamañña”nti –
tika-abh07t:1695_2: na sahajātamattatoti pavattiyaṃ rūpaṃ nāmānaṃ aññamaññapaccayo na hoti,
tika-abh07t:1695_4: Tathā upādārūpāni ca bhūtarūpānaṃ aññamaññapaccayā na hontīti vuttaṃ “mahābhūtā aññamañña”nti.
tika-abh07t:1696_1: Nanu ca “arūpino āhārā sahajātānaṃ nāmarūpāna”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1696_2: evañca sati asaññīnaṃ sahajātāhārassa asambhavato “sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti kathamidaṃ nīyatīti? Vuccate –
tika-abh07t:1696_4: taṃsahagatānampi vā sesāhārānaṃ kammūpanissayapaccayehi paccayattapariyāyaṃ gahetvā sabbasattānaṃ āhāraṭṭhitikatā vuttā,
tika-abh07t:1697_5: Yathā hi jīvitāhārā yesaṃ paccayā honti,
tika-abh07t:1697_8: na evaṃ itthipurisabhāvā liṅgādīnaṃ kenaci upakārena upakārā honti.
tika-abh07t:1697_9: Kevalaṃ pana yathāsakeheva kammādipaccayehi pavattamānaṃ liṅgādīnaṃ yathā itthādiggahaṇassa paccayabhāvo hoti,
tika-abh07t:1698_1: Yesaṃ nāmānaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ abbhantarato nikkhamantānaṃ viya pavattānaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1698_2: yesañca rūpānaṃ nāmasannissayeneva uppajjamānānaṃ sampayogāsaṅkā hoti,
tika-abh07t:1698_5: Vatthusannissayeneva jāyantānaṃ visayabhāvamattaṃ ārammaṇanti tenāpi tesaṃ sampayogāsaṅkā natthīti yesaṃ sampayogāsaṅkā atthi,
tika-abh07t:1699_1: Sabbathā sabbākārena yathārahaṃ nāmavasena vuttaṃ tividhaṃ sahajātaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1699_7: Paccuppannasabhāvena atthibhāvena tādisasseva dhammassa upatthambhakattā atthibhāvābhāvena anupakārakānameva
tika-abh07t:1699_8: atthibhāvena upakārakatā atthipaccayabhāvoti natthi nibbānassa sabbadā bhāvino atthipaccayatā,
tika-abh07t:1699_11: vigatabhāvopakārakatāviruddho ca upakārakabhāvo atthipaccayatādikāti na tassa tappaccayattappasaṅgo.
tika-abh07t:1699_12: Rūpajīvitindriyañcettha ojā viya ṭhitikkhaṇeva upakārakattā sahajātapaccayesu na gayhatīti visuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1700_1: Idāni sabbepi paccayā saṅkhepatopi catudhāyevāti dassetuṃ “ārammaṇū…pe…
tika-abh07t:1700_3: Na hi so koci paccayo atthi,
tika-abh07t:1700_6: kammahetukattā ca lokappavattiyā phalahetūpacāravasena sabbepi kammasabhāvaṃ nātivattanti,
tika-abh07t:1700_7: te ca paramatthato lokasammutivasena ca vijjamānāyevāti sabbepi catūsu samodhānaṃ gacchanti.
tika-abh07t:1701_2: taṃ sabbaṃ na avisesato daṭṭhabbanti dassetuṃ “sahajātarūpa”ntyādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1701_3: Paṭisandhiyañhi cittasamuṭṭhānarūpābhāvato pavattiyaṃ kammasamuṭṭhānānañca cittacetasikehi sahuppattiniyamābhāvato
tika-abh07t:1702_1: Iti evaṃ vuttanayena sambhavā yathāsambhavaṃ tekālikā anantarasamanantaraāsevananatthivigatavasena pañcannaṃ atītakālikānaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1702_9: kathā tappaṭipakkhabhāvena asaṅkhatā ca dhammā paññattināmarūpānaṃ vasena saṅkhepato tividhā ṭhitā sabbathā
tika-abh07t:1702_10: paṭṭhāne anantanayasamantapaṭṭhāne pakaraṇe catuvīsatisaṅkhātā paccayā nāmāti yojanā.
tika-abh07t:1706_3: iminā rūpādidhammānaṃ samūhasantānādiavatthāvisesādibhedā sammutisaccabhūtā upādāpaññattisaṅkhātā atthapaññatti vuttā.
tika-abh07t:1706_6: Iminā hi paññāpetīti “paññattī”ti laddhanāmānaṃ atthānaṃ abhidhānasaṅkhātā nāmapaññatti vuttā.
tika-abh07t:1707_1: Bhūtapariṇāmākāramupādāyāti pathavādikānaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ pabandhavasena pavattamānānaṃ patthaṭasaṅgahatādiākārena
tika-abh07t:1707_2: pariṇāmākāraṃ pariṇatabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ ākāraṃ upādāya nissayaṃ katvā.
tika-abh07t:1707_5: Sambhārasannivesākāranti dārumattikātantādīnaṃ sambhārānaṃ upakaraṇānaṃ sannivesākāraṃ racanādivisiṭṭhataṃtaṃsaṇṭhānādiākāraṃ.
tika-abh07t:1707_15: Kasiṇanimittādikāti kasiṇāsubhanimittādibhedā yogīnaṃ upaṭṭhitā uggahapaṭibhāgādibhedā nimittapaññatti.
tika-abh07t:1708_1: Nāmanāmakammādināmenāti nāmaṃ nāmakammaṃ nāmadheyyaṃ nirutti byañjanaṃ abhilāpoti imehi chahi nāmehi.
tika-abh07t:1708_7: Akkharadvārena atthaṃ nīharitvā utti kathanaṃ nirutti,
tika-abh07t:1708_11: Sā panāyaṃ nāmapaññatti vijjamānaavijjamānatadubhayasaṃyogavasena chabbidhā hotīti dassetuṃ “vijjamānapaññattī”tyādi vuttaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1709_5: tappaṭilābhino puggalassa avijjamānattā ca ayaṃ vijjamānena avijjamānapaññatti nāma.
tika-abh07t:1709_7: saddassa ca vijjamānattā itthisaddoti avijjamānena vijjamānapaññatti.
tika-abh07t:1709_9: tannissitaviññāṇassa ca vijjamānattā cakkhuviññāṇanti vijjamānena vijjamānapaññatti.
tika-abh07t:1709_10: Rañño ca puttassa ca sammutisaccabhūtattā rājaputtoti avijjamānena avijjamānapaññatti.
tika-abh07t:1710_1: Vacīghosānusārenāti bhūmipabbatarūpavedanādivacīmayasaddassa anusārena anugamanena anussaraṇena ārammaṇakaraṇena
tika-abh07t:1710_2: pavattāya sotaviññāṇavīthiyā pavattito anantaraṃ uppannassa manodvārassa nāmacintanākārappavattassa manodvārikaviññāṇasantānassa
tika-abh07t:1710_3: “idamīdisassa atthassa nāma”nti pubbeyeva gahitasaṅketopanissayassa gocarā ārammaṇabhūtā tato nāmaggahaṇato
tika-abh07t:1710_4: paraṃ yassā sammutiparamatthavisayāya nāmapaññattiyā anusārena anugamanena atthā sammutiparamatthabhedā
tika-abh07t:1710_6: sāyaṃ bhūmipabbatarūpavedanādikā paññāpetabbatthapaññāpikā lokasaṅketena nimmitā lokavohārena siddhā,
tika-abh07t:1710_7: manodvāraggahitā akkharāvalibhūtā paññatti viññeyyā paññāpanato paññattisaṅkhātā nāmapaññattīti viññeyyā.
tika-abh07t:1711_0: Ettha ca sotaviññāṇavīthiyā anantarabhāviniṃ manodvārikavīthimpi sotaviññāṇavīthiggahaṇeneva saṅgahetvā “sotaviññāṇavīthiyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1711_1: Ghaṭādisaddañhi suṇantassa ekamekaṃ saddaṃ ārabbha paccuppannātītārammaṇavasena dve dve javanavārā,
tika-abh07t:1711_2: buddhiyā gahitanāmapaṇṇattibhūtaṃ akkharāvalimārabbha ekoti evaṃ sotaviññāṇavīthiyā anantarāya atītasaddārammaṇāya
tika-abh07t:1716_1: Ito paccayaniddesato paraṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ samanaṭṭhena samathasaṅkhātānaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1716_2: aniccādivividhākārato dassanaṭṭhena vipassanāsaṅkhātānañca dvinnaṃ bhāvanānaṃ duvidhampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1716_4: kammaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ bhāvanāvīthiñca yathākkamaṃ samathavipassanānukkamena pavakkhāmīti yojanā.
tika-abh07t:1722_0: Ettha hi rāgacaritā dosacaritā mohacaritā rāgadosacaritā rāgamohacaritā dosamohacaritā rāgadosamohacaritāti evaṃ rāgādike tike sattakamekaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1722_1: Tathā saddhācaritā buddhicaritā vitakkacaritā saddhābuddhicaritā saddhābuddhivitakkacaritā buddhivitakkacaritā
tika-abh07t:1722_2: saddhābuddhivitakkacaritāti saddhādikepi tike ekanti evaṃ dve tike amissetvā cuddasa caritā honti.
tika-abh07t:1722_3: Rāgāditike pana ekadvitikamūlavasena saddhāditikena saha yojite rāgasaddhācaritā rāgabuddhicaritā rāgavitakkacaritā
tika-abh07t:1722_7: “mohasaddhācaritā”tyādinā mohamūlanayepi ekanti evaṃ ekamūlanaye sattakattayaṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t:1722_10: Timūlakanaye pana “rāgadosamohasaddhācaritā”tyādinā ekaṃ sattakanti evaṃ missato sattasattakavasena ekūnapaññāsa caritā honti.
tika-abh07t:1722_12: purimā ca cuddasāti tesaṭṭhi caritā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh07t:1725_3: Nīvaraṇavikkhambhanato paṭṭhāya gotrabhūpariyosānā kāmāvacarabhāvanā upacārabhāvanā nāma.
tika-abh07t:1725_6: Sampayuttadhammehi ārammaṇe appento viya pavattatīti vitakko appanā.
tika-abh07t:1728_3: Tadeva cakkhunā diṭṭhaṃ viya manasā uggahetabbaṃ nimittaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1728_5: Tappaṭibhāgaṃ vaṇṇādikasiṇadosarahitaṃ nimittaṃ upacārappanānaṃ ārammaṇattāti paṭibhāganimittaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1729_1: Pathavīyeva kasiṇaṃ ekadese aṭṭhatvā anantassa pharitabbatāya sakalaṭṭhenāti pathavīkasiṇaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1730_4: Setarattādinā vimissitaṃ yebhuyyena nīlavaṇṇaṃ chavasarīraṃ vinīlakaṃ visesato nīlakanti katvā.
tika-abh07t:1730_8: Soṇasiṅgālādīhi vividhenākārena khaṇḍitvā tattha tattha khittaṃ vikkhittakaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1730_9: Kākapadādiākārena satthena hanitvā vividhaṃ khittaṃ hatavikkhittakaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1731_5: Akhaṇḍatādinā suparisuddhassa attano sīlaguṇassa anussaraṇaṃ sīlānussati.
tika-abh07t:1731_8: tādisā guṇā mayi santī”ti evaṃ devatā sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā attano saddhādiguṇānussaraṇaṃ devatānussati.
tika-abh07t:1733_1: Gamanapariyesanaparibhogādipaccavekkhaṇavasena kabaḷīkārāhāre paṭikūlanti pavattā saññā āhāre paṭikūlasaññā.
tika-abh07t:1734_1: Pathavīdhātuādīnaṃ catunnaṃ dhātūnaṃ salakkhaṇato kesādisasambhārādito ca vavatthānaṃ catudhātuvavatthānaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1738_1: Idāni tassa tassa puggalassa caritānukūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ dassetuṃ “caritāsu panā”tyādimāha.
tika-abh07t:1738_2: Rāgo va caritaṃ pakati etassāti rāgacarito,
tika-abh07t:1739_0: 17. Maraṇaupasamasaññāvavatthānāni buddhicaritassa sappāyāni gambhīrabhāvato buddhiyā eva visayattā.
tika-abh07t:1740_3: Puthulaṃ mohacaritassa sappāyaṃ sambādhe okāse cittassa bhiyyosomattāya sammuyhanato.
tika-abh07t:1740_7: saddhādīnaṃ vā anupakārikā kasiṇādibhāvanā nāma natthi.
tika-abh07t:1743_5: Buddhānussatiādīsu dasasu kammaṭṭhānesu appanāvasena samādhissa patiṭṭhātuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā appanābhāvaṃ appatvā samādhi upacārabhāvena patiṭṭhāti.
tika-abh07t:1743_7: pana dutiyacatutthāruppasamādhi ca sabhāvadhammepi bhāvanāvisesavasena appanaṃ pāpuṇāti.
tika-abh07t:1744_0: 21. Pañcapi jhānāni etesamatthi, tattha niyuttānīti vā pañcakajjhānikāni.
tika-abh07t:1745_1: Asubhabhāvanāya paṭikūlārammaṇattā caṇḍasotāya nadiyā arittabalena nāvā viya vitakkabaleneva tattha cittaṃ
tika-abh07t:1747_3: laddhasukhasampattito mā vigacchantū”ti mettādivasappavattabyāpārattayaṃ pahāya kammassakatādassanena
tika-abh07t:1750_0: 26. Yathārahanti taṃtaṃārammaṇānurūpato. Kassaci ārammaṇassa aparibyattatāya “pariyāyenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1752_1: Pathavīmaṇḍalādīsu nimittaṃ uggaṇhantassāti ādimhi tāva catupārisuddhisīlaṃ visodhetvā dasavidhaṃ palibodhaṃ
tika-abh07t:1752_2: upacchinditvā piyagarubhāvanīyādiguṇasamannāgataṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ upasaṅkamitvā attano cariyānukūlaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1752_3: gahetvā aṭṭhārasavidhaṃ ananurūpavihāraṃ pahāya pañcaṅgasamannāgate anurūpavihāre viharantassa kesanakhaharaṇādikhuddakapalibodhupacchedaṃ
tika-abh07t:1752_4: katvā kasiṇamaṇḍalādīni purato katvā ānāpānakoṭṭhāsādīsu cittaṃ ṭhapetvā nisīditvā “pathavī pathavī”tyādinā
tika-abh07t:1752_8: Duvidhampi hi bhāvanāvidhānaṃ idha ācariyena atisaṅkhepato vuttaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1752_9: tadatthadassanatthañca vitthāranaye āhariyamāne atippapañco siyāti mayampi taṃ na vitthāressāma.
tika-abh07t:1752_10: Yadā pana taṃ nimittaṃ cittena samuggahitanti evaṃ pavattānupubbabhāvanāvasena yadā taṃ parikammanimittaṃ cittena sammā uggahitaṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t:1752_12: aññattha gantvā vā manasi karontassa kasiṇamaṇḍalasadisameva hutvā manodvārikajavanānaṃ āpāthaṃ āgataṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t:1756_1: Pañcasu jhānaṅgesu ekekārammaṇe uppannāvajjanānantaraṃ catupañcajavanakatipayabhavaṅgato paraṃ agantvā
tika-abh07t:1756_3: Samāpajjitukāmatānantaraṃ katipayabhavaṅgato paraṃ agantvā uppannāvajjanānantaraṃ samāpajjituṃ samatthatā samāpajjanavasitā nāma.
tika-abh07t:1756_4: Setu viya sīghasotāya nadiyā oghaṃ bhavaṅgavegaṃ upacchinditvā yathāparicchinnakālaṃ jhānaṃ ṭhapetuṃ
tika-abh07t:1756_6: Yathā paricchinnakālaṃ anatikkamitvā jhānato vuṭṭhānasamatthatā vuṭṭhānavasitā nāma.
tika-abh07t:1756_7: Atha vā yathāparicchinnakālato uddhaṃ gantuṃ adatvā ṭhapanasamatthatā adhiṭṭhānavasitā nāma.
tika-abh07t:1756_8: Yathāparicchinnakālato anto avuṭṭhahitvā yathākālavaseneva vuṭṭhānasamatthatā vuṭṭhānavasitā nāmāti alamatippapañcena.
tika-abh07t:1756_11: Vitakkādioḷārikaṅgaṃ pahānāyāti dutiyajjhānādīhi vitakkādioḷārikaṅgānaṃ jhānakkhaṇe anuppādāya.
tika-abh07t:1756_13: Tassa pana upacārabhāvanā nipphannā nāma hoti vitakkādīsu nikantivikkhambhanato paṭṭhāyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1757_5: anantaṃ ākāsa”nti ākāsaṃ ārabbha parikammaṃ karontassa,
tika-abh07t:1757_9: viññāṇaṃ viññāṇa”nti manasi kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti ācariyā.
tika-abh07t:1759_1: Avasesesu cāti kasiṇādīhi saha appanāvahakammaṭṭhānato avasesesu buddhānussatiādīsu aṭṭhasu,
tika-abh07t:1759_7: Upacāro ca sampajjatīti nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhento upacārasamādhi ca uppajjati.
tika-abh07t:1760_1: Abhiññāvasena pavattamānanti abhivisesato jānanaṭṭhena abhiññāsaṅkhātaṃ iddhividhādipañcalokiyābhiññāvasena pavattamānaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1760_2: abhiññāpādakapañcamajjhānā vuṭṭhahitvāti kasiṇānulomādīhi cuddasahākārehi cittaṃ paridametvā abhinīhārakkhamaṃ
tika-abh07t:1760_3: katvā upekkhekaggatāyogato anurūpattā ca rūpāvacarapañcamajjhānameva abhiññānaṃ pādakaṃ patiṭṭhābhūtaṃ
tika-abh07t:1760_6: Adhiṭṭheyyādikamāvajjetvāti iddhividhañāṇassa parikammakāle adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ vikubbanīyaṃ satādikaṃ komārarūpādikaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1760_8: cetopariyañāṇassa parikammakāle parassa hadayaṅgatavaṇṇadassanena sarāgādibhedaṃ cittaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1760_9: pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa parikammasamaye purimabhavesu cuticittādibhedaṃ pubbe nivutthakkhandhaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1760_10: dibbacakkhussa parikammasamaye obhāsapharitaṭṭhānagataṃ rūpaṃ vā āvajjetvā.
tika-abh07t:1761_3: Ettha hi iddhividhañāṇassa tāva pādakajjhānaṃ, kāyo,
tika-abh07t:1761_11: anāgate sattadivasesu ca pavattaṃ parittādīsu yaṃ kiñci tikālikaṃ cittameva ārammaṇaṃ hotīti mahāaṭṭhakathācariyā.
tika-abh07t:1762_2: nanu ca āvajjanāya gahitameva iddhicittassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh07t:1762_3: āvajjanāya ca paccuppannacittamārammaṇaṃ katvā nirujjhamānāya taṃsamakālameva parassa cittampi nirujjhatīti
tika-abh07t:1762_5: maggaphalavīthito aññattha āvajjanajavanānaṃ kathañca nānārammaṇatā na adhippetāti?
tika-abh07t:1762_7: Ānandācariyo pana bhaṇati “pādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya paccuppannādivibhāgaṃ akatvā kevalaṃ ‘imassa cittaṃ
tika-abh07t:1762_8: jānāmi’cceva parikammaṃ katvā punapi pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya aviseseneva cittaṃ āvajjetvā tiṇṇaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1762_9: catunnaṃ vā parikammānaṃ anantaraṃ cetopariyañāṇena parassa cittaṃ paṭivijjhati rūpaṃ viya dibbacakkhunā.
tika-abh07t:1762_10: Pacchā kāmāvacaracittena sarāgādivavatthānampi karoti nīlādivavatthānaṃ viya.
tika-abh07t:1762_12: aniṭṭhe ca ṭhāne nānārammaṇatādoso natthi abhinnākārappavattito”ti.
tika-abh07t:1762_16: dibbacakkhussa pana rūpameva paccuppannanti ayametesaṃ ārammaṇavibhāgo.
tika-abh07t:1763_4: dibbavihārasannissitatāya ca dibbañca taṃ sotañcāti dibbasotaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1763_6: Attano santāne nivutthavasena ceva gocaranivāsavasena ca pubbe atītabhavesu khandhādīnaṃ anussaraṇaṃ pubbenivāsānussati.
tika-abh07t:1763_7: Vuttanayena dibbañca taṃ cakkhu cāti dibbacakkhu.
tika-abh07t:1763_10: Na hi tesaṃ visuṃ parikammaṃ atthi.
tika-abh07t:1763_11: Tattha anāgataṃsañāṇassa tāva anāgate sattadivasato paraṃ pavattanakaṃ cittacetasikaṃ dutiyadivasato paṭṭhāya pavattanakañca yaṃ kiñci ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t:1771_0: 45. Tiṇṇaṃ lakkhaṇānaṃ anu anu passanā aniccānupassanādikā.
tika-abh07t:1772_3: Udayaṃ muccitvā vaye pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ bhaṅgañāṇaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1772_4: Saṅkhārānaṃ bhayato anupassanāvasena pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ bhayañāṇaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1772_5: diṭṭhabhayānaṃ ādīnavato pekkhaṇavasena pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ ādīnavañāṇaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1772_7: Nibbinditvā saṅkhārehi muccitukamyatāvasena pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ muccitukamyatāñāṇaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1772_8: Muccanassa upāyasampaṭipādanatthaṃ puna saṅkhārānaṃ pariggahavasappavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhāñāṇaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1772_9: Paṭisaṅkhātadhammesu bhayanandīvivajjanavasena ajjhupekkhitvā pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1772_11: upari ca sattatiṃsāya bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ anukūlaṃ ñāṇaṃ anulomañāṇaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1774_5: Manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ rūpādīsu saṃvaraṇavasena pavattaṃ sīlaṃ indriyasaṃvarasīlaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1774_7: Paccaye sannissitaṃ tesaṃ idamatthikatāya paccavekkhaṇasīlaṃ paccayasannissitasīlaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1776_4: phalañca paccupaṭṭhāna”nti evaṃ vuttānaṃ lakkhaṇādīnaṃ “phusanalakkhaṇo phasso,
tika-abh07t:1776_7: ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ rūpa”ntyādinā saṅkhepato ca pariggaho paccattalakkhaṇādivasena paricchijja gahaṇaṃ dukkhasaccavavatthānaṃ
tika-abh07t:1776_8: diṭṭhivisuddhi nāma “nāmarūpato attā natthī”ti dassanato diṭṭhi ca attadiṭṭhimalavisodhanato visuddhi
tika-abh07t:1777_1: Paccayapariggahoti nāmañca rūpañca paṭisandhiyaṃ tāva avijjātaṇhāupādānakammahetuvasena nibbattati.
tika-abh07t:1777_8: āvajjanañca uppajjatīti evaṃ sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇavasena tīsu addhāsu nāmarūpappavattiyā paccakkhādisiddhassa
tika-abh07t:1777_9: kammādipaccayassa pariggaṇhanaṃ samudayasaccassa vavatthānaṃ kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhi nāma “ahosiṃ nu kho
tika-abh07t:1777_11: “sattharikaṅkhatī”tyādikāya aṭṭhavidhāya ca kaṅkhāya vitaraṇato atikkamanato kaṅkhāvitaraṇā,
tika-abh07t:1778_2: paccayavavatthānavasena ca pariggahitesu lokuttaravajjesu tibhūmipariyāpannesu nāmarūpesu atītādibhedabhinnesu
tika-abh07t:1778_4: ārabbha kalāpavasena piṇḍavasena saṅkhipitvā yaṃ atīte jātaṃ rūpaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1778_11: Tasmā “aniccaṃ attādivasena na iccaṃ anupagantabbaṃ khayaṭṭhena khayagamanato,
tika-abh07t:1778_13: anattā asārakaṭṭhena attasārādiabhāvenā”ti ca “cakkhuṃ aniccaṃ…pe… mano. Rūpaṃ…pe… dhammā.
tika-abh07t:1779_0: Sammasanañāṇe pana uppanne puna tesveva saṅkhāresu “avijjāsamudayā rūpasamudayo,
tika-abh07t:1779_3: taṇhākammaāhāranirodhā rūpanirodho”ti evaṃ rūpakkhandhe vedanāsaññāsaṅkhārakkhandhesupi āhāraṃ apanetvā
tika-abh07t:1779_8: vipariṇāmalakkhaṇamattassa ca dassanena khaṇavasena cāti ekekasmiṃ khandhe paccayavasena catudhā,
tika-abh07t:1779_10: pañcadhā vayanti dasadasaudayabbayadassanavasena samapaññāsākārehi udayabbayañāṇena udayabbayaṃ samanupassantassa
tika-abh07t:1779_11: āraddhavipassakassa yogino vipassanācittasamuṭṭhāno sarīrato niccharaṇakaālokasaṅkhāto obhāso,
tika-abh07t:1779_21: obhāsādīsu uppannesu “na vata me ito pubbe evarūpo obhāso uppannapubbo”tyādinā nayena tattha ālayaṃ kurumānā
tika-abh07t:1779_22: sukhumataṇhā rūpanikanticāti obhāsādīsu dasasu vipassanupakkilesesu uppannesu “na vata me ito pubbe evarūpā
tika-abh07t:1779_24: phalappattosmī”ti aggahetvā “ime obhāsādayo taṇhādiṭṭhimānavatthutāya na maggo,
tika-abh07t:1779_26: tabbinimuttaṃ pana vīthipaṭipannaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ maggo”ti evaṃ maggāmaggalakkhaṇassa vavatthānaṃ nicchayanaṃ maggāmaggassa jānanato,
tika-abh07t:1779_28: amagge maggasaññāya visodhanato ca maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhi nāma.
tika-abh07t:1780_2: Nava vipassanāñāṇānīti khandhānaṃ udayañca vayañca jānanakaṃ udayabbayañāṇaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1780_4: bhaṅgavasena upaṭṭhitānaṃ sīhādīnaṃ viya bhāyitabbākārānupekkhakaṃ bhayañāṇaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1780_7: jālādito macchādikā viya tehi tebhūmakadhammehi muccitukāmatāvasena pavattaṃ muccitukamyatāñāṇaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1780_8: muccanupāyasampādanatthaṃ diṭṭhādīnavesupi samuddasakuṇī viya punappunaṃ sammasanavasappattaṃ paṭisaṅkhānupassanāñāṇaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1780_9: cattabhariyo puriso viya diṭṭhādīnavesu tesu saṅkhāresu upekkhanākārappavattaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1780_11: uddhaṃ maggakkhaṇe adhigantabbānaṃ sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammānañca anulomato maggavīthiyaṃ gotrabhuto
tika-abh07t:1780_12: pubbe pavattaṃ saccānulomikañāṇasaṅkhātaṃ navamaṃ anulomañāṇanti imāni nava ñāṇāni ñāṇadassanavisuddhiyā
tika-abh07t:1781_4: Idāni appanā uppajjissatīti “idāni appanāsaṅkhāto lokuttaramaggo uppajjissatī”ti vattabbakkhaṇe.
tika-abh07t:1781_5: Yaṃ kiñcīti saṅkhārupekkhāya gahitesu tīsu ekaṃ yaṃ kiñci.
tika-abh07t:1782_5: saṅkhāranimittato ca vuṭṭhahanato vuṭṭhānasaṅkhātaṃ maggaṃ gacchatīti vuṭṭhānagāminī.
tika-abh07t:1784_4: Maggasaccaṃ bhāvanāvasenāti maggasaccasaṅkhātassa sampayuttamaggasaṅkhātassa catutthasaccassa sahajātādipaccayo hutvā vaḍḍhanavasena.
tika-abh07t:1785_1: Dve tīṇi phalacittāni pavattitvāti magguppattiyā anurūpato dve vā tīṇi vā phalacittāni apanītaggimhi
tika-abh07t:1785_2: ṭhāne uṇhattanibbāpanatthāya ghaṭehi abhisiñcamānamudakaṃ viya samucchinnakilesepi santāne darathapaṭippassambhakāni
tika-abh07t:1785_6: yāni sandhāya “vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1786_1: Idāni paccavekkhaṇāya bhūmiṃ dassetuṃ “maggaṃ phalañcā”tyādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1786_2: Tattha “imināva vatāhaṃ maggena āgato”ti maggaṃ paccavekkhati.
tika-abh07t:1786_3: Tato “ayaṃ nāma me ānisaṃso laddho”ti tassa phalaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1786_4: tato “ayaṃ nāma me dhammo ārammaṇato sacchikato”ti nibbānañca paṇḍito paccavekkhati.
tika-abh07t:1786_5: Tato “ime nāma me kilesā pahīnā”ti pahīne kilese,
tika-abh07t:1786_6: “ime nāma avasiṭṭhā”ti avasiṭṭhakilese paccavekkhati vā, na vā.
tika-abh07t:1786_10: Tathā hi mahānāmo sakko “ko su nāma me dhammo ajjhattaṃ appahīno”ti appahīne kilese pucchi.
tika-abh07t:1786_11: Arahato pana avasiṭṭhakilesapaccavekkhaṇaṃ natthi sabbakilesānaṃ pahīnattā,
tika-abh07t:1786_12: tasmā tiṇṇaṃ sekkhānaṃ pannarasa arahato cattārīti ekūnavīsati paccavekkhaṇañāṇānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh07t:1787_1: diṭṭhivisuddhiādīnaṃ vasena sarīrabhūtānaṃ catunnanti etāsaṃ channaṃ visuddhīnaṃ kamena.
tika-abh07t:1791_2: Saṅkhāresu “yo attābhiniveso kammassa kārako phalassa ca vedako eso me attā”ti evaṃ abhiniveso daḷhaggāho,
tika-abh07t:1791_3: taṃ muñcantī “anattā”ti pavattā anupassanāva attasuññatākārānupassanato suññatānupassanā nāma vimokkhamukhaṃ
tika-abh07t:1791_4: paṭipakkhato vimuttivasena vimokkhasaṅkhātassa lokuttaraṃ maggaphalassa dvāraṃ hoti.
tika-abh07t:1792_1: Saṅkhāresu “anicca”nti pavattā anupassanā anicce “nicca”nti pavattaṃ saññācittadiṭṭhivipallāsasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-abh07t:1792_2: vipallāsanimittaṃ muñcantī pajahantī vipallāsanimittarahitākārānupassanato animittānupassanā nāma vimokkhamukhaṃ
tika-abh07t:1793_2: etaṃ sukha”ntyādinā nayena pavattaṃ kāmabhavataṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ taṇhāpaṇidhiṃ taṇhāpatthanaṃ muñcantī dukkhākāradassanena
tika-abh07t:1794_1: Tasmāti yasmā etāsaṃ tissannaṃ etāni tīṇi nāmāni,
tika-abh07t:1794_3: Maggo suññato nāma vimokkho hoti āgamanavasena laddhanāmattā.
tika-abh07t:1796_2: Yathāsakaṃ phalamuppajjamānampīti yathāladdhamaggassa phalabhūtaṃ attano attano phalaṃ uppajjamānampi
tika-abh07t:1796_3: maggāgamanavasena alabhitvā vipassanāgamanavaseneva tīṇi nāmāni labhati phalasamāpattikāle tadā maggappavattābhāvena
tika-abh07t:1796_7: taṇhāpaṇidhirahitattā ca suññataanimittaappaṇihitanāmavantaṃ nibbānaṃ ārabbha pavattattā tassa vasena.
tika-abh07t:1799_1: Sattakkhattuṃ sattasu vāresu kāmasugatiyaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇaṃ paramaṃ etassāti sattakkhattuparamo na pana aṭṭhamādikāmabhavagāmītyadhippāyo.
tika-abh07t:1799_2: Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “na te bhavaṃ aṭṭhamamādiyantī”ti.
tika-abh07t:1799_3: Rūpārūpasugatibhavaṃ pana sattavārato parampi gacchatīti ācariyā.
tika-abh07t:1801_0: 70. Khīṇā cattāro āsavā etassāti khīṇāsavo. Dakkhiṇārahesu aggattā aggadakkhiṇeyyo.
tika-abh07t:1805_6: Yāva ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ gantvāti evaṃ samathavipassanānaṃ yuganaddhabhāvāpādanavasena yāva ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1805_8: Adhiṭṭheyyādikanti kāyapaṭibaddhaṃ ṭhapetvā visuṃ visuṃ ṭhapitacīvarādiparikkhāragehādīnaṃ aggiādinā avināsanādhiṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1805_10: sattāhabbhantare āyusaṅkhārappavattiolokananti catubbidhaṃ adhiṭṭhānādikaṃ pubbakiccaṃ katvā.
tika-abh07t:1813_0: (Ka) cārittena kulācārena sobhite visālakule udayo nibbatti yassa, tena,
tika-abh07t:1813_1: kammādivisayāya saddhāya abhivuddho parisuddho ca dānasīlādiguṇānaṃ udayo yassa, tena,
tika-abh07t:1813_4: paṇidhāya patthetvā yaṃ pakaraṇaṃ patthitaṃ abhiyācitaṃ,
tika-abh07t:1814_0: (Kha) tena pakaraṇappasutena vipulena puññena paññāvadātena ariyamaggapaññāparisuddhena sīlādiguṇena sobhitā.
